story:
(ENGLISH VERSION DOWN BELOW)

El proyecto

Coto de Caza es un fotolibro peruano que relata la experiencia personal del joven fotógrafo Juan Yactayo Sono dentro de lugares ilícitos de intercambio homosexual anónimo en Lima, Perú.

Con imágenes registradas durante dos años con una cámara celular, y la reproducción de conversaciones reales dentro de grupos de internet privados,  este libro nos sumerge en un recorrido que refleja la vorágine de sensaciones, emociones y experiencias del autor al ingresar a estos lugares en busca de su propia identidad, de su sexualidad, del poder sobre otros y sobre sí mismo.

Queremos que nos des tu apoyo para imprimir 500 ejemplares de este libro y pagar a todo el equipo de edición y diseño que ha colaborado en este largo y fascinante proceso.


La cacería comienza

Este proyecto consistía inicialmente en documentar las dinámicas que se llevaban a cabo dentro de estos espacios ilícitos, escondidos, clausurados y reabiertos nuevamente cientos de veces, y sometidos a prejuicios violentos e invasivos de parte de la sociedad civil y de las leyes peruanas.

Sin embargo, dentro del Laboratorio editorial revisamos durante ocho meses más de 500 fotografías y muchas conversaciones de chats privados, y logramos que el libro nos transporte no solo hacia estos espacios, sino también hacia el miedo, la soledad, la sorpresa, la excitación e incertidumbre del propio autor.

“En ese momento era uno más de ellos. Era parte e incluso centro de lo que estaba pasando en ese cuarto. Sonreí.” Juan Yactayo Sono

En PPS valoramos los procesos humanos porque consideramos que son vitales para la creación artística. Un libro es un espacio idóneo para transmitir, compartir e involucrar a los lectores  con diversas realidades. Nos sentimos comprometidas con los artistas emergentes y con trabajar temas importantes para nuestra sociedad.

Queremos que Coto de Caza llegue a la mayor cantidad de lectores en el mundo para dar a conocer una experiencia humana pero también muy universal, y de esa manera seguir visibilizando a la comunidad LGBT de nuestro país.

Coto de Caza 

Actualmente, Coto de Caza se encuentra en su última etapa de diseño para ser publicado en junio. El libro mide 16.5 cm. x 12 cm.,  tiene  104 páginas (aprox.), 45 imágenes (aprox.), y contará con textos en español y en inglés. 

¡Mira cómo va quedando!

     

(preview de la maqueta)


Para esta primera publicación, hemos contado con un equipo multidisciplinario de amigos profesionales que nos han ayudado en cada etapa del proceso.

Son los mejores:

· Gabriela Salas (Editora invitada)

· Felipe Esparza (Diseñador)

· Diana Collazos (Dirección de video)

· Jorge Ochoa (Cámara de video)

· Francesca Dasso (Edición de video)

· Giuliana Vidarte (Entrevista principal)

Hemos diseñado premios muy especiales, experiencias que los llevarán a conocer más acerca del proyecto Coto de Caza. ¡Denles una mirada!

Perk: Foto + libro


¡Pasa la voz!

Ayúdanos aportando a la campaña y también difundiendo este proyecto con todos los que conozcas. Comparte esta página en tus redes sociales, dale like a nuestro FB  (Pequeño Pato Salvaje Laboratorio editorial) y a nuestro Twitter, en donde iremos actualizando los avances del libro.

¡Muchas gracias!

                                                                

Pequeño Pato Salvaje (PPS) es un Laboratorio Editorial, nacido en Lima-Perú, enfocado en la publicación de libros de artista de creadores emergentes. Empezamos a trabajar desde el año 2015 y Coto de Caza, de Juan Yactayo Sono, es nuestro primer libro. Nosotras somos: Amelia Santana (fotógrafa), y Marcela Rodríguez (comunicadora), fundadoras y directoras editoriales.

La dinámica del Laboratorio editorial está basada en la interacción y colaboración de un equipo de trabajo conformado por el artista/autor, los editores y diseñadores, cuyas distintas miradas y perspectivas ayudan a comunicar un mensaje no sólo con el contenido, sino también con la forma (el diseño) del libro, de manera sensible y honesta. 

Algunos enlaces para que nos conozcas:

www.juanyactayosono.com

https://www.facebook.com/pequenopatosalvaje/

https://twitter.com/ppseditorial

www.ppseditorial.com

_____________________________________________________________________________

ENGLISH VERSION RIGHT HERE!!!!!!!!!


What is this project about?

Coto de Caza (Hunting Reserve) is a peruvian photobook about the personal experience of a young photographer, Juan Yactayo Sono, inside illicit homosexual anonymous cruising spots in Lima, Peru.

With images captured during two years with a phone camera, and real chats from private internet comunities, this book takes us to a journey through the author´s feelings, emotions and experiences in search of his own identity, his sexuality and self discovery.

We want your support to print 500 copies of this book and pay the entire editing and design team that has worked on this long and fascinating process.

The hunting begins

At the begining, the aim of this project was to document the different dynamics happening inside of these spaces; all of them illicit, hidden, closed down and re-opened hundreds of times, subject to violent and invasive prejudice from society and peruvian laws.

However, after eight months of editing work in PPS Lab , more than 500 photographs and many private chats reviews, we finally had a book  that take us inside these cruising spots, but also inside the fear, loneliness, surprise, excitement and uncertainty of the author.

"Right there I was one of them. I was part and even center of what was going on in that room. I smiled. " JYS

PPS values human processes as vital for artistic creation, and feel that a book is the perfect media to spread and share these experiences and realities with our readers. We are committed to emerging artists and relevant topics about our society.

We want Coto de Caza to reach as many readers in the world as posible, to talk about a human experience and to increase the visibility of the LGBT community in Peru.



Coto de Caza 

(preview of photobook dummy)

Currently, the book is at its last design stage to be published in June. Coto de caza is 16.5 cm. x 12 cm., has 104 págs. (approx.) 45 images (approx.),  and texts in English and Spanish.

For this first publication we worked with a multidisciplinary team of professionals who have helped us in every step of the process.

The best:

●  Gabriela Salas (Guest Editor)

●  Felipe Esparza (Designer)

●  Diana Collazos (Video Direction)

●  Jorge Ochoa (Camera)

●  Francesca Dasso (Video Editing)

●  Giuliana Vidarte (Interview)

We have designed very special perks for you. We want you to experience  the whole Coto de Caza journey! Check them out!

Spread the word!

Help us contributing to the campaign and spreading this project with everyone you know. Share  in your social networks, follow us in FB (Pequeño Pato Salvaje Laboratorio Editorial) and Twitter. We will be sharing updates for you!

Thanks a lot!

Pequeño Pato Salvaje (PPS) is a Publishing Laboratory born in Lima-Peru, specialized in the publishing of artist’s books from emerging creators. We began working in 2015, and Juan Yactayo’s Coto de Caza  is our first book.We are: Amelia Santana (photographer), and Marcela Rodríguez (communicator), founders and editors.

A publishing lab is a space for exploration, creation and experimentation of different artistic forms to produce a book. It is based on the interaction and collaboration between artists, editors and designers whose different views and perceptions help the artist convey his/her vision so it can be communicated in a clear and honest way to their audience.

Some links:

www.juanyactayosono.com

https://www.facebook.com/pequenopatosalvaje/

https://twitter.com/ppseditorial

www.ppseditorial.com

story:
Story of My Book

Endless in August is the tale of a bachelor father and his daughter, Gracie, who set out on an adventure every August to connect through one thing: fly fishing. Gracie has a gripping realization after being told that the Mayfly only lives for 24 hours, and after enduring a tragedy, recollects everything she was taught about life to make a monumental decision. It's an art-centric, coming-of-age story that will test your emotions and question your opinions on aging, mortality, and the world around you.

My name is Taylor Kickbush and I’m the author of Endless in August. The inspiration for this novel is derived from a culmination of things, including but not limited to: a man I met at a bar, a spontaneous birthday trip, a kayaking adventure, and a car accident. After all of these happenings, in that order, I was left asking one question:

The uncertainty of death is frightening, isn’t it?

I've spent much of my life in fear, pursuing the answers to certain questions. In fear of the discovery of what is true; in fear of diminishing time; in fear of the final deadline. When asked if death terrifies me, even after so many years of going to church and being aware that there is an end, I admittedly didn’t have any clue how I felt about it. That is, until I was hurling down a thruway on August 1, 2019, and endured a car accident that could have easily killed me. I left the scene certain that I was not ready to die. 

Tell me: what if you knew today that you’d be saying au revoir  to this world? Would you take any chance you could to further extend your life? Are we in such fear of death that we’d do anything to postpone it? 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover some answers to the grander questions we all have about life. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for self-discovery and comprehending mortality. And then, ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you unravel your own beliefs about life and death.

You will love this book if you enjoy having a deeper connection with characters—if you enjoy laughing, loving, and crying with them. It is my wish that you grow to feel for Benjamin and Gracie, just as they would feel for you.

The Book - Endless in August

The book is written in 21 chapters, each with a unique flavor that adds to the overall story.

In the beginning, you are introduced to three of the main characters: Ben, a soon-to-be bachelor father; Gracie, his daughter; and her imaginary friend, Jack. The three of them are on their annual fishing trip where Ben finally has the opportunity to connect with his daughter over a common interest: fly fishing.

In the next few chapters, you’ll read along with Ben’s off-the-cuff sense of humor and his unique occupation, learn about Gracie’s quirks, and get to know Ben’s artistic wife, Naomi. A scene between Ben and Naomi in Chapter 8 becomes a catalyst for the remainder of the story.

Chapter 10 involves a small, but necessary, time-hop. You will learn how Gracie and Ben grow and how, both physically and mentally, life is changing them. These growth-centric chapters continue until Chapter 14, where we dive deeper into the muck that Gracie starts to feel as an early teen.

I cried writing Chapter 16.

Chapters 17 through 21 are truly focused on Gracie and a new character I can’t wait for you to meet, who introduces her to the biology of the Mayfly and what small impacts a change in genetic code can mean for her understanding of life, death, and letting go.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • and a personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

About the Author

Taylor Kickbush is a User Experience Engineer and a Washington, D.C., expat who works as a contractor for the federal government. Her farm-town roots trace back to western New York where she first fell in love with writing, nature, and the world. Today, she escapes to new states and countries as often as she can to reignite her curiosity and knack for creativity.

Endless in August was composed due to Taylor’s need to discover answers about mortality at a time when she felt most uncertain. Taylor’s intention is to share with you, through the eyes of Benjamin and Gracie, the vulnerable, delicate, and beautiful existences we live, even if they may or may not be eternal. 

Taylor has witnessed both beautiful and heartbreaking comings and goings, indisputable love, and unimaginably painful death. She understands that sometimes we choke a bit on the desire to understand the why of it all. Just as any post-journalism graduate would do in a period of uncertainty, Taylor lives to ask questions, seek answers, and write.

For more information you can connect with Taylor at taylor.kickbush@gmail.com and @taylorkickbush on all social platforms.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  •  Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use  #EndlessInAugust and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

-Taylor Kickbush

story:
“I see the birth of something beautiful, it will blossom and bloom”

“It is a really unique blog/magazine - I love the balance of creativity and country living”

“It's my favourite blog, can't wait for the magazine!”

 

Our Manifesto & The Magazine

...life should be lived slowly and wholeheartedly.

...embracing the seasons and nature brings great joy.

... sharing stories and traditions is a wonderful way to connect with others.

...cherishing everyday adventures allows for a simpler, more meaningful life.

 

Creative Countryside magazine is for those who strive to live more slowly, who are inspired by the first apple ready to be picked and who walk outside in the rain. It is for lovers of stories, everyday adventures and local traditions. It is curated for those who opt for simplicity, appreciate ancient crafts, and celebrate the seasons.

The ad-free magazine will sit happily on your bookshelf for many years to come. Support independent publishing and print by pre-ordering a copy today.

 

Timeline (approx.)

  • Beginning of September 2017: crowdfunding campaign closes and we move to InDemand funding (more below), send magazine to be printed
  • Friday 6th October: seasonal supper launch
  • Beginning of October 2017: magazine and rewards will be sent out

 

What We Need & What You Get

The crowdfunding campaign raised £2,786 and funded 136% of the project costs - thank you so much! Our initial target was £2,050, which covered the publishing costs for issue 1. The extra 36% has allowed us to also cover website and admin fees, and put a bit aside for the printing of issue 2. In order to be able to cover all printing costs for issue 2, and to pay our contributors, we need to raise closer to £5,000, which is why we've moved to InDemand funding. 

You can now choose to pre-order a copy of issue 1, or if you'd just like to donate that's possible too.

NB: the winners of the competitions we ran during the campaign will be announced shortly.

 

Editor's Backstory

I (Eleanor) left my job as an English teacher with the aim of focusing on creative writing projects for a year. Then I had a baby. And started a Masters course. And things got busier than they have ever been. But here we are, 12 months after leaving behind security and full-time employment, and my passion project is on the cusp of becoming a real publication.

The best part of working on the magazine has been the ability to create a community of like-minded souls who have joined together to share ideas, words, stories and images in the creation of a new creative mould. I’d love it if you joined us.

 

Risk

The magazine content has been finalised, and the design is almost complete. Regardless of how much is raised, it will go to print and you will receive your copy (plus rewards) no matter what the outcome. There is no risk!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

As a small business, we'd love to increase our reach and awareness of the magazine. Please share the campaign with your followers and friends if you can!

story:
Hi, I'm Lincoln!

I'm an author of horror and science fiction books and I love to tell ridiculous and wild stories. I've written over twenty books throughout my life under three different pen names. The first book I published was when I was fourteen years old. The only thing I remember about it is that it was a lot of fun, but the final result was terrible. I had no idea what I was doing, no guidance, and it was far from a finished project.

Since then, I've written five horror novels, several space operas and techno thrillers, and even a couple of literary books about social issues in America. The genres I write are all over the place, but in general I stick with horror, science fiction, and thrillers (and best case scenario is when I can do all three at once!).

My newest book-in-progress fits firmly in the techno thriller genre, and it's one I have been working on for several years. It's adapted to changes in my writing style and the kinds of stories I want to tell, and whenever I think about it I get excited. I love the technology of the Crispr/Cas9 system and the implications for our future as humans. It represents a leap forward unlike anything we've seen before, and the possibilities are endless.

However, wrapped inside that are social issues and philosophical issues about what it is to be human. We are already using this new system around the world to engineer new traits into animals and considering its applications in fighting off genetic diseases...how long will it be until we are using it to engineer our own humanity?

What I Need & What You Get

  • Funding for this project is going to be in printing the pre order copies and getting them ready for the publication date in September.
  • Donating to the campaign will get you one of the first copies when the book is available.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, please support this campaign by letting people you know about it!

story:
Introduction

My name is Charlie Collins - and I have wrestled with the idea of honor in a wide variety of contexts. Through all of that wrestling, I believe I have gained some insights into what it means to behave honorably - and it is important to me to share those thoughts, so that others will have a chance to reflect on them and respond with ideas of their own.

In addition to that primary goal, I also want to explore an alternative approach to publishing. I want to get this book into the public domain, so that it can help foster discussion - so what I am asking is that you help to support this approach to publishing. By supporting this sort of effort directly, contributors make it possible for authors to consider releasing their work in this way, rather than managing copyrights.

What We Need & What You Get

In simple terms, here is what I am asking:

  • I really want to get this book out, so I am setting my target at $1000.
  • However, I hope contributors see the value of this approach to publishing - so I am secretly hoping to exceed that goal, to make it feasible for authors to consider looking for support this way.
  • If I make my goal, this book will be available for you to read and share - I hope it will foster a lot of discussion and reflection.
  • There also are a lot of nice perks - have a look!

The Impact

Your contribution is truly valuable:

  • You will be helping to make available an important driver for conversation.
  • You will be demonstrating that authors can consider new ways of sharing content.

Risks & Challenges

I tend to be pretty cautious, so this book is completely drafted, and has been through a couple of editing cycles. I plan to go through at least one more, to try to minimize mistakes (not eliminate - minimize; see the "flawed copy" perk . . .). There are some other minor tasks - I still need to see the cover completed and make sure that I have book numbers and copyright notices and that sort of thing. However, I am confident that I will be able to complete those things before the campaign is finished - I have been through the process with other books, before. (BTW, those are available through the perks, if you are interested!)

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if contributing is not the right thing for you, for whatever reason, please spread the word! This process works best when lots of people are involved. Worth considering is that you never know who might be interested in what this campaign has to offer - so please use the Indiegogo tools let people know, so that they have a chance to decide. They may thank you for the opportunity!

story:
Would you guess that someone who was born and raised in south Florida—a girl who eagerly climbed on the roof of her house to spot Saturn V contrails and first-stage separations of the Apollo missions—would grow up to write page-turner crime fiction novels set during the American Revolution?   

I hated history the way it was taught in high school: gutted of all the cool stuff, reduced to facts and dates so I remembered it the wrong way. When I was younger, I wrote a lot of paranormal suspense and science fiction out of protest.

Somehow, though, the siren of American history called to me, especially the Revolution. Maybe because of those early telescopes, microscopes, even a submarine—and brave people harnessing the power of wind to travel, make the world a smaller place. Maybe because I seldom heard a tourist get Florida’s pre-19th-century history right. But surely because I knew propaganda when I smelled it, and high school history in the public schools had been full of propaganda about the American Revolution.

All right, admit it. When you think of the Revolution, you imagine bewigged, boring men who spout unintelligible political philosophy—right? And who wants to slog though that? When you read fiction, you want to be immersed in another world. You want to escape.

I’m on a mission to make the American Revolution accessible and fun for you. For twenty years, I’ve researched this war. A decade of that time, I was a Revolutionary War reenactor, so I know the look, smell, taste, feel, and sound of the period. I give you realistic, relatable characters, tightly plotted drama, and thrilling history. You’ll feel like you’re there. Even better, you’ll never miss the 21st century.

Because I write each Michael Stoddard American Revolution mystery as stand-alone, even though it’s part of a series, you won’t get lost by reading the books out of chronological order. You can jump right into Killer Debt, if you like. But the first three books have a track record of earning high-star reviews, so you’ll want to read them.

Here are examples of what readers say about them:

"A time machine to another time and place by masterful storyteller Suzanne Adair." — Midwest Book Review (Deadly Occupation)

“With a few deft strokes, [Adair] re-creates a time when the world was lit by a few candles and traveling from Wilmington to Hillsborough took five grueling days on horseback.” — The Wilmington Star-News (Regulated for Murder)

“Wonderfully complex characters and a fascinating story line are coupled with terrific writing.” — Great Historicals (A Hostage to Heritage)

The Stoddard books have also won some accolades. Suspense Magazine put Regulated for Murder on its “Best of 2011” list. And A Hostage to Heritage won the Indie Book of the Day Award.

The Impact

Did you know that the 250th anniversary of the Revolution is right around the corner? Oh, but the “Semiquincentennial” isn’t merely about the Fourth of July 2026. The Revolution was a long war—years in coming and going. Anniversary events may already be happening in your state.

I’m making Killer Debt, book #4 of the Michael Stoddard series, available for pre-order via the perks to give readers, reviewers, and backers access to the book early, before its official release.

And by getting the book to as many readers as possible, my goal is to spotlight to a much larger audience the founding history of America, which serves as the backbone for my series.

I invite you to join Michael Stoddard’s Revolution!

$1500 Goes to Recovery of Publishing Costs

  • Ebook and paperback cover design
  • Manipulation of central figure on cover for period accuracy
  • Ebook and paperback interior design
  • ISBN purchase
  • Copyright purchase
  • An expanded distribution option for retailers

Risks and Challenges

The good news is that this campaign isn’t about trying to raise enough funding to complete or publish the book. Killer Debt is already written and professionally edited. Publishing costs have been covered. If you pre-order the book, you won’t have to wonder whether the campaign will generate enough funding for Killer Debt to be published. It’s a done deal.

Listen while I read the first chapter of Killer Debt at IllogiCon 2018 in January and answer questions from the audience.

Or read a PDF file of the first chapter of Killer Debt.

Then  pre-order Killer Debt, and enjoy your visit to the past.

Other Ways You Can Help

I’d appreciate your help at making some noise!

  • Email this campaign link to your reader friends, especially those who enjoy history and mysteries.
  • Use Indiegogo’s share tools to spread the word on social media.
  • Subscribe to my newsletter, and follow me on Facebook and Twitter.
  • Post reviews of my books on your favorite sites.
  • Wish me luck!

I’m scheduled to travel to a lot of author events, where I’ll talk about my books, history, and writing. Check the calendar on my web site. If I’m coming to a location near you, stop by and introduce yourself. I enjoy meeting readers!

story:
Story of My Book

New Bridges to Growth is a discussion of the greatest challenges facing the developing world in the 21st century, from climate change to global pandemics, and how sustainable infrastructure solutions will be the key to solving them.

My name is Andy Ruan and I am the author of New Bridges to Growth. I wrote this book because of my passion for global development and for discovering innovative, win-win solutions to the world's toughest problems. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will share my passion for the future of the developing world. I hope to instill in you the same sort of curiosity and excitement that I have for sustainable infrastructure and its massive potential in the fight against extreme poverty and climate change. In the book, I propose a number of ways to channel greater investment in water, energy, and connectivity in the poorest parts of the world. Now is the time to take action, build climate resilience, and imagine a better world for us all.

In this book, you'll learn about energy, water, and road projects and why they are so important for emerging economies. You'll hear from the world's foremost development experts about infrastructure finance and the massive opportunity facing private sector institutional investment to channel their capital into sustainable development. You'll hear stories about...

Zambia and its miraculous journey to deliver solar power at historically low costs.

The Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank and new approaches to multilateral development.

Giants in the development community and their courageous journeys to keep the fight against poverty alive.
 

What I Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this next spring.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish it.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

About the Author

Andy Ruan is an undergraduate economics student at Vanderbilt University. He is naturally curious and driven by a desire to bring real impact to the lives of others.  

Andy’s dual studies in economics and sociology have led him to an intense passion for global development and the fight against climate change and extreme poverty. His conversations with leaders in the multi-lateral development sphere 
have led him to discover innovative ways to solve the world’s most salient challenges. His mission is to spread awareness of these solutions and inspire hope for the future.

Andy is a lover of comedy podcasts, boxing, and his dog Tito. He’s a silly guy at heart and is always looking for new places to bust out his killer dance moves.

For more information, you can connect with Andy at andrew.ruan2@gmail.com and at @andyyruan on instagram.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #newbridges and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your support!

Thanks again,

Andy

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #newbridges and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
Thank you so much for all of your support!Thanks again,Andy

story:
About Camp Awesome
Camp Awesome is a labour of love for us - Sean Skerry and Gavin Hall - two old chums who are diving into a new creative project together to create something fun and distinctly home-grown for all the little readers in our lives. The concept of the camp is loosely based on our childhood experiences growing up both at summer camp and from being involved with scouting. We've partnered up with Sarah Dykerman, an Elementary School teacher with a Masters Degree in Literacy Education on PEI to help us shape our stories for young readers, and bring focus to the lessons our characters learn at camp.

Teaching Resources
To supplement our Camp Awesome books, we will be producing a variety of resources for school teachers; worksheets, puzzles, colouring pages, reader reflections, classroom decorations and more - that will enrich the experiences children have with our books and characters. With Sarah's first-hand knowledge of navigating suitable, value-added classroom content, we can deliver high-quality educational materials that can easily be used for teacher classroom and curriculum outcomes. We want to supply teachers with tools beyond the book to help make the Camp Awesome experience a memorable and meaningful one for their young readers.


The Author
Sarah Dykerman is an elementary school teacher from rural Prince Edward Island and has taught at schools throughout the province. She is the proud momma of three wonderful children; Jim, Angus and Mae. Anyone who knows Sarah knows she has a creative spark and passion for education. She pours her heart and soul into her classroom work both when the students are present, and long after the last bell has rung. Literacy has always been a huge part of what she imparts upon her students. She has always written creative stories to fit the curriculum or the lesson of the day and is excited to bring her personal touch to Camp Awesome.

The Illustrator
Sean Skerry is a graphic artist from Nova Scotia. He studied graphic design at Holland College in PEI, and has since racked up a good 10+ years of industry experience with design shops in Calgary, Charlottetown and Halifax. Though he has no little readers of his own yet, his background in cartooning and illustration have helped him shape Camp Awesome into a bold, colourful and playful world that young readers will want to explore again and again.

The Other Guy!
Gavin Hall is managing all the important background steps that must be taken in order to make the Camp Awesome project a viable reality. A self-employed PEI real estate agent for over 7 years, Gavin brings his business acumen and resource management to the Camp Awesome team.

story:
Story of My Book

Fashion’s Biofabrication Revolution

My book is about how biotechnology is changing the way designers make clothes, and how we as consumers, interact and dispose of them.

My name is Ayesha Ahmad and I am the author of Fashion’s Biofabrication Revolution. I wrote this book because I am a fashion enthusiast, and I have always been interested in fashion. I grew up flipping through Vogue and watching YouTube videos of fashion shows with my mom. In addition to loving fashion, I’m also a major science nerd. I recently graduated with a B.S. in Bioinformatics. In college, I was always in the library studying genetics or organic chemistry. I started to research the merge of these two seemingly unrelated fields and came across Suzanne Lee’s Ted Talk, “How to Grow Your Clothes,” in which she talked about how to grow clothes with bacteria. I found this so fascinating and decided to do more research and write a book.  

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how biotechnology is impacting the fashion industry. With this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for biotechnology and fashion. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you change your perspective on the relationship you have with your clothes.

In this book, you'll learn about different biological tools and biofabrication projects:

Biofabrication - how it is poised to change the fashion industry, and what designers and scientists have already accomplished

Bacteria’s potential of production - while bacteria are microscopic, they are nature’s perfected tools, and we have more use for them than we realize. 

Changing your relationship with your clothing - the fast fashion industry has perpetuated the cycle of wear and dispose, biofabrication presents another alternative: wear and biodegrade

You will love this book if you love fashion, biotechnology, and are interested in creating a more sustainable fashion industry.

Fashion’s Biofabrication Revolution is a non-fiction book that speaks to fashion enthusiasts and scientists who are looking at the fashion industry and biotechnology for the first time.

 

The Book - Fashion’s Biofabrication Revolution

The book is written in 4 Parts....

Part 1 contains the Introduction + Chapters 1-3. This section explores the fashion industry in the past, present, and future. You will learn about how the fashion industry in America has evolved and how biofabrication will further change it. 

Part 2 contains Chapters 4-8. This section highlights projects and companies that are using biofabrication to create alternatives to leather, textile, and plastics. You will learn about how companies are utilizing nature's blueprint and catering it to create these products. 

Part 3 contains Chapters 9-11. This section focuses on companies that are using biofabrication to create alternative fibers for textiles. You will learn about the alternative resources that startups have began to use to create fibers, like pineapple leaves and seaweed. 

Part 4 contains Chapters 12-15. This section of the book focuses on dyeing textiles with bacteria. You will learn about the different types of bacteria that companies are using to create dyes, and how this saves water and prevents harmful chemicals polluting water sources. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020
  • The Cover Design of my book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for my book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter

  • When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish.
  • When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover cover edition.
  • When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audio edition.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share my experience of writing my book

 

About the Author

Ayesha Ahmad recently graduated with a B.S in Bioinformatics from Loyola University Chicago this past May. 

She wrote this book to explore her passions of biology and fashion. When she is not writing, you can find her spending time with her family. Her mom, also a fellow fashion enthusiast, has been teaching her how to sew during quarantine so that Ayesha can emulate the same styles models wear on the catwalk. In her free time, she loves working out and watching Bollywood movies . 

For more information you can connect with Ayesha Ahmad at aahmad9@luc.edu and on the following social media networks: 

  • LinkedIn: Ayesha Ahmad 
  • Instagram: @ayeshanayahmad
  • Twitter: @ayeshanayahmad

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #FashionBiofabricationRevolution and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Ayesha Ahmad

story:
Hi everyone!

I am a parent consultant, psychologist and a teacher. I help parents to understand their kids better and build a connection that will nurture their kids throughout life.

Today I invite you to support my project - a series of 5 beautiful books about emotions!

Please watch my video to know more about it!

You are going to love these books! They are available in English, Russian, and Ukrainian.

All books are written in a story like form for kids with beautiful bright illustrations.

Here are topics the books are going to cover:

  1. Frustration. Young children can get frustrated a 100 times a day which causes them a storm of emotions. They start fighting, screaming, falling on the floor, throwing tantrums, calling names and biting!
  2. Going to bed: helping our little ones to fall asleep easily and with a smile on the face.
  3. Self-love, acceptance, believing in yourself no matter what.
  4. Helping children cope in situations where they need to say goodbye to an adult they are attached to.
  5.  Emotion of detachment: sometimes our children push us away if we unwittingly hurt them. What is the right way to deal with such situations?

 

If you would like to learn more about it below you can find a description of each book:

Дорогие друзья!

Я психолог, родительский консультант и педагог раннего развития. Я помогаю родителям лучше понимать своих детей и строить с ними глубокие отношения, которые будут питать ребенка на протяжении всей жизни.

Сегодня я приглашаю вас поучаствовать в моем проекте - создании прекрасной серии книг для детей про эмоции. Вы можете сделать предзаказ одной книги, всей серии или даже нескольких комплектов книг, чтобы сделать подарок близким.
Посмотрите короткое видео, чтобы узнать об этом больше.

Темы, которые затрагиваются в сказках:

1) агрессия, неприятие, истерики ребенка в ситуациях, когда что-то для них идет не так;

2) сложности с укладыванием спать: как помочь ребенку заснуть спокойно и даже с улыбкой на лице;

3) трудности с расставанием со взрослыми: как помочь малышу справиться с необходимостью идти в садик(школу) или отпустить родителей на работу;

4) вера в себя, любовь к себе, умение не опускать рука и не сдаваться, даже если не получается с первого раза;

5) эмоция отчуждения: ситуации, когда мы невольно ранили ребенка, и он отталкивает нас. Что поможет ему снова почувствовать нашу любовь?

Если хотите узнать подробнее, ниже вы найдете описание каждой из пяти книг серии:

     

    1. Tutti and the Terrible Yellow Leaves

     

    One day Tutti the raccoon woke up in his forest and was horrified to see that all his favorite green trees had turned yellow! He was outraged! At first he politely asked them to turn green again, then he yelled and demanded. But nothing worked....

    Every one of us encounters situations where something doesn't go quite the way we wanted it to.

    Young children can get frustrated a 100 times a day which causes them a storm of emotions. They start fighting, screaming, falling on the floor, throwing tantrums, calling names and biting!

    We can try to punish them for this, try to explain that this is not the way to behave. We can even threaten them with "natural consequences"... But we quickly learn that it simply doesn't work.

    This book can help a child understand their emotions and express them in a civilized way.

    "Nastya, my son (4.5 years old) asks to listen to your fairy tale over and over again. His behavior has changed a lot these days. He has become kinder to his brother and started to express his emotions much more calmly."

    Find out what helped Tutti not to hit the tree when he had an impulse to do it, and how the wise forest elf helped him to overcome his frustration.

    1.       Тутти и ужасные желтые листья

    Однажды енотик Тутти проснулся в своем лесу и с ужасом увидел, что все его любимые зеленые деревья пожелтели! Его негодованию не было предела! Сначала он вежливо просил их снова стать зелеными, затем он кричал и требовал. Но ничего не работало…

    Каждый из нас сталкивается с событиями, когда что-то идет совершенно не так, как мы хотели.

    У маленьких детей таких ситуаций может быть по 100 в день. Это вызывает у них бурю эмоций! Они начинают драться, кричать, падать на пол, устраивать истерики, обзываться и кусаться!

    Мы можем попробовать наказать их за это, попытаться объяснить, что так вести себя нельзя. Можем даже пригрозить им “естественными последствиями”… Но быстро поймем, что это не работает.

    Как помочь ребенку понимать свои эмоции и выражать их цивилизованно? 

    «Настя, мой сын (4,5 года) просит слушать твою сказку снова и снова. За эти дни его поведение очень изменилось. Он стал добрее к брату, уже не такой агрессивный, и начал выражать свои эмоции намного спокойнее».

    Узнайте, что помогло Тутти не ударить дерево, когда очень сильно этого хотелось, и как мудрый лесной эльф помог ему преодолеть досаду.

    2.       Why Tutti doesn't like going to bed.

    Evening has come. Which means it is time to go to bed. Tutti doesn't like going to bed. And that's why he doesn't like the evenings...

    This is how it begins not only the tale of Tutti the raccoon, but almost every evening in a family with a preschool child.

    Oh those "I'm thirsty," "I'm hungry," "I'm not done playing" - every time we say it's time to go to bed!..

    What is the real reason why kids don't want to go to bed? And how can we help make it easier for them to do that?

    "Nastya, it's magic! My son fell asleep with a smile on his face 10 seconds after having finished listening to your story!"

    "We use your idea every day now, just making up new variations. Going to bed has become a pleasant adventure. Thank you for the fairy tale!"

    Beautiful illustrations and a cozy fairy tale atmosphere - thanks to this book, bedtime will be a moment of warm contact for every mom and her child.

    2.       Почему Тутти не любит ложиться спать.

    Пришел вечер. А значит, пора ложиться спать. Тутти не любил спать. И поэтому он не любил вечер…

    Так начинается не только сказка про енотика Тутти, но и практически каждый вечер в семье, где есть ребенок-дошкольник.

    Ох, уж эти «хочу пить», «я голодный», «я не закончил играть» - каждый раз, как только мы говорим, что пора идти спать!..

    Почему на самом деле дети не хотят ложиться спать? И как мы можем помочь, чтобы им это проще удавалось?

    «Настя, это магия! Мой ребенок заснул с улыбкой на лице через 10 секунд после того, как прослушал твою сказку!».

    «Мы теперь каждый день используем твою идею, только выдумываем новые вариации. Укладывание спать стало приятным приключением. Спасибо тебе за сказку!»

    Волшебные иллюстрации и уютная атмосфера сказки - благодаря этой книге время перед сном станет моментом теплого контакта для каждой мамы и ее ребенка.

    3. Love-you

     

    A tale of how Tutti the raccoon goes to school for the first time. He has waited for this day for so long! But why then, when it was time to say goodbye to his mom, he suddenly clung to her and didn't want to let her go?

    It's very difficult for preschool children to experience inner conflict, on the one hand, they want to do something, and on the other, they are scared and just can't let go of their Mom!

    This fairy tale will help children cope in situations where they need to say goodbye to an adult they are attached to. For example, when mom or dad leaves for work, or when you have to go to school.

    The simple words said by the mother to her baby raccoon have become a magic thread to hold on to, even at a distance. Wherever you are, wherever you go…

    "I read the story to my three daughters. We have exactly the same problem with the middle one (5.5 years old) every time she needs to go to gymnastics or daycare. The older one is 11 now and I thought she was too old for this kind of story. I was so surprised when she came up to me and said in my ear: "Mama, why don't you say that to me every time we're saying goodbye?” Nastya, your stories are full of love and warmth, they help mothers find the right words for the child in difficult situations!"

    3. Лю-блю

    Сказка о том, как енотик Тутти впервые идет в школу. Он так долго ждал этого дня! Но почему тогда, как только пришло время прощаться с мамой, он вдруг вцепился в нее и не захотел отпускать?

    Деткам дошкольного возраста очень сложно переживать внутренний конфликт, когда с одной стороны, хочется что-то сделать, а с другой – страшно и просто невозможно отпустить маму!

    Эта сказка поможет детям справляться в ситуациях, когда нужно прощаться с любимым взрослым. Например, когда мама или папа уходят на работу. Или, когда самому нужно идти в садик или в школу.

    Простые слова, сказанные мамой своему малышу еноту, стали волшебной ниточкой, за которую можно держаться даже на расстоянии. Где бы ты ни был, куда бы ни пошел…

    «Я читала сказку своим трем дочерям. Со средней (5,5 лет) у нас именно такая проблема каждый раз, когда ей нужно идти на гимнастику или в садик. Старшей уже 11 лет, и я думала, что она слишком взрослая для таких сказок. Как же я удивилась, когда она потом подошла ко мне и сказала на ушко: «Мама, а давай ты и мне будешь так говорить каждый раз, когда мы прощаемся». Настя, твои сказки полны любви и теплоты, они помогают мамам подбирать нужные слова для ребенка в сложных ситуациях!»

    4. Tutti and the snowflakes

    Tutti loves to race, but he has a hard time losing. Not only is he frustrated, but he also gives up and doesn't want to try again.

    With the story, the child will be able to live through the emotions that arise when we fail to be the first in everything.

    They often keep a child from moving forward and not giving up.

    How can we help him to be resilient and go through such difficulties without losing confidence?

    A tale about self-love, acceptance, about believing in yourself no matter what.

    "My daughter (age 6) loves all the Tutti tales. She listens to them every night before going to bed. But for this one I want to say a special thank you. When Lilya listened to it, she said to me, "Mom, you're the best mom ever! I wouldn't trade you for any other mother!" It was touching to the point of tears. It was also the same story that helped me resolve a conflict between the kids a few weeks later. They were already starting to cry and fight when I reminded them about Tutti and the snowflakes. As a result, my daughter was able to look at the situation from a different angle.”

    4. Тутти и снежинки

    Тутти очень любит бегать на перегонки, но ему очень сложно проигрывать. Мало того, что он расстроен, так он еще и не хочет пробовать снова.

    Через сказку ребенок сможет прожить вместе с героем эмоции, которые возникают, когда нам не удается быть во всем первыми.

    Они часто мешают ребенку двигаться вперед и не бросать начатое.

    Как мы можем помочь ему быть устойчивым и переживать подобные сложности, не теряя уверенности?

    Сказка про любовь к себе, про принятие, про веру в себя несмотря ни на что.

    «Моя дочь (6 лет) очень любит все сказки про Тутти. Она слушает их каждый вечер перед сном. Но за эту сказку я хочу сказать тебе отдельное спасибо. Когда Лиля ее прослушала, она сказала мне: «Мама, ты лучшая мама на свете! Я бы тоже не променяла тебя ни на какую другую!». Это было приятно до слез. А еще эта же сказка помогла мне через несколько недель решить конфликт между детьми. Они уже начинали плакать и ругаться, как я напомнила им про Тутти и снежинки. Дочка сразу все поняла и смогла посмотреть на ситуацию под другим углом».

    5. Tutti and the vanillaberries.

     

    Tutti`s mom woke up very early today. She had a long way to go to Magic Mountain, the only place where vanillinaberries grow. Tutti had been waiting for his mother all day. He imagined he would run happily into her arms. But that was not what happened.

    When his mother came back, he turned his head from her and walked away. He did not feel like talking to her, much less hugging her. A very hard emotion! An old friend came to help, a forest elf, who was very wise and knew everything about emotions.

    Sometimes our children push us away if we unwittingly hurt them. What is the right way to deal with such situations?

    Find out how a forest elf helped Tutti to feel love again.

    "Nastya, thank you! Read it with my daughter and discussed it. You know what the funniest thing is? It's a fairy tale about me! I was the one who behaved this way toward my husband today! I was talking to him in a cold tone over a seemingly insignificant thing. But I couldn't help it. Your fairy tales help not only to introduce the child to emotions, but also to understand my own”.

    5. Тутти и ванилинки

    Мама Тутти проснулась сегодня очень рано. Ей предстоял далекий путь на Волшебную Гору - единственное место, где растут ванилинки.Тутти ждал маму весь день. Представлял, как он с радостью побежит к ней в объятия. Но все произошло иначе.

    Когда мама вернулась, он отвернулся от нее и отошел подальше. Ему не хотелось разговаривать с ней, и, тем более, обниматься. Очень неприятная эмоция! На помощь пришел старый друг, лесной эльф, который был очень мудрым и знал все-все об эмоциях.

    Бывает, наши дети отталкивают нас, если мы невольно их ранили. Как правильно вести себя в подобных ситуациях? 

    Сказка о материнской любви, которая способна смягчить любое сердце.

    «Настя, спасибо! Прочитали с дочкой и обсудили. Знаешь, что самое смешное? Это же сказка про меня! Это я сегодня вела себя так по отношению к мужу! Разговаривала с ним холодным тоном из-за, казалось бы, мелочи. Но ничего не могла с собой поделать. Твои сказки помогают не только познакомить ребенка с эмоциями, но и понять мои собственные».

    $3750 - cost of translation, editing and transportation.

    Вместе мы можем намного больше, чем по одному!
story_txt:
Hi everyone!
I am a parent consultant, psychologist and a teacher. I help parents to understand their kids better and build a connection that will nurture their kids throughout life.
Today I invite you to support my project - a series of 5 beautiful books about emotions!
Please watch my video to know more about it!
You are going to love these books! They are available in English, Russian, and Ukrainian.
All books are written in a story like form for kids with beautiful bright illustrations.

Here are topics the books are going to cover:

Frustration. Young children can get frustrated a 100 times a day which causes them a storm of emotions. They start fighting, screaming, falling on the floor, throwing tantrums, calling names and biting!
Going to bed: helping our little ones to fall asleep easily and with a smile on the face.
Self-love, acceptance, believing in yourself no matter what.
Helping children cope in situations where they need to say goodbye to an adult they are attached to.
 Emotion of detachment: sometimes our children push us away if we unwittingly hurt them. What is the right way to deal with such situations?

 
If you would like to learn more about it below you can find a description of each book:
Дорогие друзья!
Я психолог, родительский консультант и педагог раннего развития. Я помогаю родителям лучше понимать своих детей и строить с ними глубокие отношения, которые будут питать ребенка на протяжении всей жизни.
Сегодня я приглашаю вас поучаствовать в моем проекте - создании прекрасной серии книг для детей про эмоции. Вы можете сделать предзаказ одной книги, всей серии или даже нескольких комплектов книг, чтобы сделать подарок близким.Посмотрите короткое видео, чтобы узнать об этом больше.

Темы, которые затрагиваются в сказках:
1) агрессия, неприятие, истерики ребенка в ситуациях, когда что-то для них идет не так;
2) сложности с укладыванием спать: как помочь ребенку заснуть спокойно и даже с улыбкой на лице;
3) трудности с расставанием со взрослыми: как помочь малышу справиться с необходимостью идти в садик(школу) или отпустить родителей на работу;
4) вера в себя, любовь к себе, умение не опускать рука и не сдаваться, даже если не получается с первого раза;
5) эмоция отчуждения: ситуации, когда мы невольно ранили ребенка, и он отталкивает нас. Что поможет ему снова почувствовать нашу любовь?
Если хотите узнать подробнее, ниже вы найдете описание каждой из пяти книг серии:

 
1. Tutti and the Terrible Yellow Leaves One day Tutti the raccoon woke up in his forest and was horrified to see that all his favorite green trees had turned yellow! He was outraged! At first he politely asked them to turn green again, then he yelled and demanded. But nothing worked....
Every one of us encounters situations where something doesn't go quite the way we wanted it to.
Young children can get frustrated a 100 times a day which causes them a storm of emotions. They start fighting, screaming, falling on the floor, throwing tantrums, calling names and biting!
We can try to punish them for this, try to explain that this is not the way to behave. We can even threaten them with "natural consequences"... But we quickly learn that it simply doesn't work.
This book can help a child understand their emotions and express them in a civilized way.
"Nastya, my son (4.5 years old) asks to listen to your fairy tale over and over again. His behavior has changed a lot these days. He has become kinder to his brother and started to express his emotions much more calmly."
Find out what helped Tutti not to hit the tree when he had an impulse to do it, and how the wise forest elf helped him to overcome his frustration.

1.       Тутти и ужасные желтые листья
Однажды енотик Тутти проснулся в своем лесу и с ужасом увидел, что все его любимые зеленые деревья пожелтели! Его негодованию не было предела! Сначала он вежливо просил их снова стать зелеными, затем он кричал и требовал. Но ничего не работало…
Каждый из нас сталкивается с событиями, когда что-то идет совершенно не так, как мы хотели.
У маленьких детей таких ситуаций может быть по 100 в день. Это вызывает у них бурю эмоций! Они начинают драться, кричать, падать на пол, устраивать истерики, обзываться и кусаться!
Мы можем попробовать наказать их за это, попытаться объяснить, что так вести себя нельзя. Можем даже пригрозить им “естественными последствиями”… Но быстро поймем, что это не работает.
Как помочь ребенку понимать свои эмоции и выражать их цивилизованно? 
«Настя, мой сын (4,5 года) просит слушать твою сказку снова и снова. За эти дни его поведение очень изменилось. Он стал добрее к брату, уже не такой агрессивный, и начал выражать свои эмоции намного спокойнее».
Узнайте, что помогло Тутти не ударить дерево, когда очень сильно этого хотелось, и как мудрый лесной эльф помог ему преодолеть досаду.
2.       Why Tutti doesn't like going to bed.
Evening has come. Which means it is time to go to bed. Tutti doesn't like going to bed. And that's why he doesn't like the evenings...
This is how it begins not only the tale of Tutti the raccoon, but almost every evening in a family with a preschool child.
Oh those "I'm thirsty," "I'm hungry," "I'm not done playing" - every time we say it's time to go to bed!..
What is the real reason why kids don't want to go to bed? And how can we help make it easier for them to do that?
"Nastya, it's magic! My son fell asleep with a smile on his face 10 seconds after having finished listening to your story!"
"We use your idea every day now, just making up new variations. Going to bed has become a pleasant adventure. Thank you for the fairy tale!"
Beautiful illustrations and a cozy fairy tale atmosphere - thanks to this book, bedtime will be a moment of warm contact for every mom and her child.

2.       Почему Тутти не любит ложиться спать.
Пришел вечер. А значит, пора ложиться спать. Тутти не любил спать. И поэтому он не любил вечер…
Так начинается не только сказка про енотика Тутти, но и практически каждый вечер в семье, где есть ребенок-дошкольник.
Ох, уж эти «хочу пить», «я голодный», «я не закончил играть» - каждый раз, как только мы говорим, что пора идти спать!..
Почему на самом деле дети не хотят ложиться спать? И как мы можем помочь, чтобы им это проще удавалось?
«Настя, это магия! Мой ребенок заснул с улыбкой на лице через 10 секунд после того, как прослушал твою сказку!».
«Мы теперь каждый день используем твою идею, только выдумываем новые вариации. Укладывание спать стало приятным приключением. Спасибо тебе за сказку!»
Волшебные иллюстрации и уютная атмосфера сказки - благодаря этой книге время перед сном станет моментом теплого контакта для каждой мамы и ее ребенка.

It's very difficult for preschool children to experience inner conflict, on the one hand, they want to do something, and on the other, they are scared and just can't let go of their Mom!
This fairy tale will help children cope in situations where they need to say goodbye to an adult they are attached to. For example, when mom or dad leaves for work, or when you have to go to school.
The simple words said by the mother to her baby raccoon have become a magic thread to hold on to, even at a distance. Wherever you are, wherever you go…
"I read the story to my three daughters. We have exactly the same problem with the middle one (5.5 years old) every time she needs to go to gymnastics or daycare. The older one is 11 now and I thought she was too old for this kind of story. I was so surprised when she came up to me and said in my ear: "Mama, why don't you say that to me every time we're saying goodbye?” Nastya, your stories are full of love and warmth, they help mothers find the right words for the child in difficult situations!"

Деткам дошкольного возраста очень сложно переживать внутренний конфликт, когда с одной стороны, хочется что-то сделать, а с другой – страшно и просто невозможно отпустить маму!

story:
Short Summary

Running Against the Odds - A memoir about my childhood challenges, disappointments, and rejections that preceded my triumphs as a runner and my historical moment as a coach.  

My name is Desmond Dunham, also known as Coach Dez, and I am the author of Running Against the Odds. I wrote this book to let others know that dealing with trauma or having the odds stacked against you, can strengthen and fuel you to find your victory in life.  Underdogs do prevail!

Running Against the Odds is a reminder that you are not alone with all the challenges that the world presents. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you reconnect to your purpose and to fulfill your goals and dreams.

While reading  this book, you'll learn about how adversity and failure builds character. You'll hear stories such as:

  • How I learned to become the man of the house at age 11
  • How one race put me in the back of an ambulance
  • How my journey to the Motherland deepened my spirit and my sense of purpose 

You will love this book if you ever felt like the underdog; if you felt like your childhood or life is less than perfect; and if you are seeking your true passion in life.

The book is written in three (3) parts.

Part 1 (chapters 1-9) Readers will learn that adversity and trauma don’t define who you are but can reveal the potential you have inside. This all began with my first high school cross country practice, which would change the entire trajectory of my life.

Part 2 (chapters 10-15) Here is where my coming of age story unfolds. Attending Howard University and traveling to South Africa during my senior year would become instrumental in my development and would lay the foundation for how I viewed myself as well as how I would view the world. It is where I would learn the true essence of humility and gratitude.

Part 3 (chapters 16-23) My journey into manhood fueled me to become one of the best coaches in the nation. It would be my challenges and shortcomings that would become my students’ and student-athletes’ inspiration.

 

 What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. Money raised though this presale campaign will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in September 2021.

  • Donation to Full Count Male Mentorship Program.
  • Public Relations support for the book campaign.
  • Development of a teachers' guide.

Note: Date of launch party will be  contingent on COVID-19 guidelines and restrictions.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.  I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • Donation of shoes to a youth sports organization.

  • An opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • Invitation to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Desmond “Coach Dez” Dunham is a youth sports expert with over two decades of coaching and teaching experience. He has successfully coached youth athletes and teams in cross-country, track & field, basketball, soccer, baseball, and flag football. Most notably, Desmond has had one of the most prolific coaching careers in high school cross-country and track & field. He is one of the most decorated high school coaches in the country and boasts national All-Americans, national championships, and international titles from the short sprints up to the distance events, including cross-country.

Desmond wrote Running Against the Odds in hopes that sharing his story will inspire others to continue pursuing their dreams. The adversity he faced during his childhood will be all too familiar to so many. It was running and a caring coach that changed his life's trajectory, and he in turn has impacted the lives of so many other young people. Coach Dez is passionate about teaching kids life lessons through sports. His life is evidence that when a true champion prevails, he reaches out to help others find their own path to victory.

Desmond still enjoys long runs in the rain and claims fall as his favorite time of year, because it reminds him of so many fond cross-country memories. When he's not teaching and coaching, he loves spending time with his family, working out, and traveling.

For more information, you can learn more or connect with Coach Dez at:

Website: www.coachdezdunham.com
Instagram: @coachdezdunham  Facebook: @coachdezdunham
Twitter: @coachdezdunham  LinkedIn: @desmonddunham

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping of the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that isn’t the only way you can help. You can easily share my pre-sale campaign link at the top of this page to friends and family through text or social media. When sharing on social (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn), please use #runningagainsttheodds and tag me, @coachdezdunham as well as my publisher, @NewDegreePress, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5-10 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,

Coach Dez

story:
Story of My Book

The Body's Resilience is a book that embodies the voice of a speaker, a young adult, currently struggling with relationships around her; romantic and platonic. As a result, she goes through an abundance of emotions until she finds her moment of a relational “rebirth.” She is confronted with her realization of her detachment from the problems present in the world, due to  being consumed in her own personal problems. She proceeds to be an advocate for the earth and the voiceless. 

My name is Tianna Gonzalez and I am the author of The Body's Resilience. I wrote this book to let people know that break-ups and unsettling family dynamics are a difficult part of our lives, and it is okay to acknowledge these tidal waves of emotions, but they must be aware of what is happening in the world around them that is currently so self-absorbed. It doesn't matter if we like it or not, we are in an unbinding relationship with Mother Earth. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the advocate within yourself and come to terms with unhealthy relationships, both past and present. I also want readers to know that they are not alone in how they feel and what they go through and sometimes confiding in a stranger's words is just what they need. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for love, the environment, and immigration, and so much more, in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you heal yourself and other's around you.

In this book, you'll experience:

* Relationships/grief
* Rebirth/renewal 
* Political/environmental satire

You will love this book if you are a lover of contemporary poetry.


The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part 1:

 The speaker is struggling with relationships around her; romantic and platonic. Her experiences within these relationships, whether they are directly related to her, or she is just a witness to them, makes her go through an abundance of emotions including grief and/or trying to find acceptance with the outcomes of these relationships. 

Part 2:

The speaker goes through a rebirth of relationships and she realizes her negligence to and detachment from the world, which was due to her being distracted by her own personal life. As people, we often do this and are so concerned with what we need to do for ourselves that we do not try to make a difference in the environment and world we live in.

Part 3:

 This section contains political/environmental satire as a result of the speaker's realization in section two. 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:


* The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2019
* The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
* The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
* The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
* The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

* A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

* Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
* Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
* The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
* I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
* And more...

About the Author

Tianna Gonzalez is a student at the University of Rochester majoring in Creative Writing with a minor in Biology, while taking pre-requisites to become a Physician Assistant for Pediatrics. 

Tianna has always been passionate about writing for as long as she could remember. Her interest in poetry did not peak until she was a senior in high school when she took an Advanced Placement American Literature class and wrote her first thoughtfully written poem for the class' poetry unit on the Holocaust. Ever since, Tianna has continued writing poetry as a way to express herself, what she simply could not say, on paper. People always asked her why she is a Creative Writing major if she wants to be in the medical field, and her answer every time is: “any health related program post undergrad wants to get to know who you really are. They want to see below the surface of just the health enriched aspect of you because it makes you stand out in a pool of all Biology majors.” Tianna simply wants to share her love for poetry with others and letting people know you can love two different things that are at both ends of the spectrum. 

For more information you can connect with Tianna at tiannagonzo@gmail.com and on instagram @tianna.gonzalez.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

* Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TheBodysResilience and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
* You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
* Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support. 

Thanks again,

Tianna Gonzalez
