story:
Story of my Book

Unlocking Unicorns is a book about the stories, habits, and lessons of billion-dollar startup founders in Africa, Asia, and the Middle East. While many individuals can recite the founding legends of Steve Jobs at Apple, Bill Gates at Microsoft, or Mark Zuckerberg at Facebook, only a handful can re-tell the stories of similarly successful non-Western founders. This book is a solution. It features translated stories derived from interviews with the founders of unicorn companies in emerging economies.

My name is Michael Bervell, and I am the author of Unlocking Unicorns. I am also an online blogger about innovation, entrepreneurship, and ideas. Every day for the last 500 days I have written one new startup idea on my blog, BillionDollarStartupIdeas.com. In just over a year I have reached more than 55,000 readers and 1,300 newsletter subscribers in more than 175 countries. Writing this global blog has taught me that while ideas are valuable, execution is everything.

Unlocking Unicorns is the key to unlocking execution in emerging economies. I wrote this book because I believe that building the billion-dollar companies of the future will require an intimate understanding of both emerging economies and local jurisdictions.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the mental models and characteristics that enabled founders in Africa, Asia, and the Middle East to overcome and adapt to brain drain, leapfrogging technologies, location-based discrimination, and government unrest. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for diversity in entrepreneurship. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as the key to help you Unlock Unicorns in the developing world.

In this book, you'll learn about how the Internet and digital ecosystem is revolutionizing non-Western corporations. You'll hear stories translated from Chinese, Korean, Hindi, and Igbo and learn...

  • Philosophies such as “Guanxi” and mental models such as the "Regret Minimization Framework" that successful entrepreneurs have used to thrive while building unicorn companies in Africa, Asia, and the Middle East.
  • How Jack Ma (founder of AliBaba), Bang Si-Hyuk (producer behind BTS), Cher Wang (founder of HTC), Mitchell Elegbe (founder of Africa’s first billion-dollar FinTech company) found the ideas behind their billion-dollar enterprises.
  • A framework for thinking about how to go from aimlessly testing out business ideas to refining to the right idea to finally executing on that idea to achieve business success.

 

You will love this book if you (1) Aspire to be a c-suite executive or founder of a global business anytime in the next 50 years, (2) Are an entrepreneurship junkie who loves creating or consuming content about startups and businesses, or (3) Want to learn more about the ecosystem of creativity in emerging economies around the world.

Unlocking Unicorns is a nonfiction book that speaks to aspiring founders and emerging economy investors who want to look at doing business during the international, interconnected 21st century in a new way.

 

The Book -- Unlocking Unicorns

The book is written in 3 parts...

Part 1, Exploration contains the Introduction + Chapters 2-4. This section sets out to answer the question: how do entrepreneurs find the ideas that create a billion-dollar corporation? While all founders must embark on similar journeys to expand their world views before creating companies, the three founders you’ll read about in Part 1 are exceptional embodiments of exploration. They started by either intentionally or unintentionally exploring the world around them and, even as unicorn company CEOs, continue to use their unique skills to succeed. The three founders are Jack Ma (Alibaba), Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw (Biocon), and Mitchell Elegbe (Interswitch).

Part 2, Refinement contains Chapters 5-7. While unicorn companies may operate in a variety of fields, they all reveal a core kernel of truth when all the bells and whistles are stripped away. How should entrepreneurs build the heart of their business to sustain hyper-scaled growth? The three founders that you’ll read about in Part 2 distilled their complex explorations into focused efforts that develop mission-driven businesses. While the business world has infinite possibilities, Mudassir Sheikha (Careem), Cher Wang (HTC), and Robin Li (Baidu) refined their visions to effectively pull along a team and create an impact.

Part 3, Execution contains Chapters 8-10 + the conclusion. So, then, what are the specific skills that a founder needs to build a unicorn? How does one scale from a profitable enterprise to a billion-dollar cash cow? The three founders you’ll read about in Part 3 realized that even after selecting an idea and refining it, success is a direct result of executing on a clear strategy. The strategies that Ritesh Agarwal (OYO), Hooi Ling Tan (Grab), and Bang Si-Hyuk (BTS) used to grow were immensely successful because they not only refined into a focus area, but also execute relentlessly.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.

When I pre-sell 120 paperback copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in a Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Michael Bervell is a Ghanaian-American angel-investor, entrepreneur, philanthropist, and philosopher. In 2007, he co-founded “Hugs for” an international, student-run non-profit organization focused on using grassroots strategies to develop countries around the world. To date, "Hugs for" has fundraised over $500,000 of material and monetary donations; impacted over 300,000 youth around the world; and expanded operations to 6 countries (Tanzania, Ghana, United States, Uganda, Kenya, and Sierra Leone). He is a former board member of the Harvard Alumni Association; currently serves as the youngest President of the Harvard Club of Seattle; and works as a Portfolio Development Manager at M12, Microsoft’s Venture Fund.

Michael is fascinated by how to use business not just as a means for generating money for shareholders, but to generate positive social, environment, and financial ripple effects. Whether through investing in diverse founders to expand the entrepreneurial ecosystem or pushing aspiring founders to create B corporations, he hopes that this book will be used as evidence for the importance of developing entrepreneurial ecosystems globally as a means for equality.

Outside of academics, Michael is an avid Chess player, aspiring Masterchef, and amateur jazz drummer. He loves exploring the outdoors, experimenting with fashion trends, and eating at hole-in-the-wall restaurants.

For more information, you can connect with Michael Bervell at MichaelBervell.com/contact, on Twitter [twitter.com/MichaelBervell], or on LinkedIn [linkedin.com/in/michaelbervell/].
 

International Pre-orders

For international preorders, please send me a private message at MichaelBervell.com/contact and complete this Google Form.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #UnlockingUnicorns and tag me so that I can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Michael Bervell

story:
All profit above publishing costs will go to developing programs and a halfway house for women in conflict with the law in the Niagara Region.


Their Stories

One woman faces deportation to a country in which she could be killed. A young lady who was living in a shelter was offered money she could not refuse to be a drug mule. Numerous women call 911 while their partners are beating them and when the police arrive, they arrest the women because they act hysterical and throw them in jail with broken bones, black eyes and a mound of bruises.

These are some of the stories in Jeannette Tossounian's second book 'Prisoners: War on the Poor' (working title). 


Jeannette Tossounian 

Jeannette Tossounian was wrongfully convicted in 2012 of the arson of her new art gallery downtown St. Catharines, Ontario. While incarcerated for 2 years in maximum security at Vanier Centre For Women in Milton, Ontario, she wrote nine books; three about the Canadian justice and correctional systems from a prisoners point a view. 
The first book 'Songs from The Slammer' a collection of poems about jail and sketches of her jail issue items that Jeannette created while in her jail cell, was released earlier this year and has been a popular seller among the prison reformists and abolitionists.  
Now Jeannette is ready to fund her second book - her jail journals. Writing almost everyday for the last year and half of her sentence, Jeannette captures what it is like to be an inmate in a Canadian women's jail and shares the different stories of the women she bonded with while doing her time.

Tossounian interviewed by Guelph Prison Radio

Misconception 

There is a great misconception that citizens are locked up in jail because they are a danger to society. People imagine jails full of twisted murders and robbers waiting for that moment to be free so they could do more harm to the first victim they come across. If this was true, there would be very few prisons and very few prisoners. 
Unfortunately, the reality of jail is that they are full of mostly Canada's poorer people who are stuck in a situation that they cannot afford to get out of. As a matter of fact, anyone at anytime could find themselves incarcerated whether they actually committed a crime or not. 

War

Incarceration is an attack among Canada's poor.  
There is no need to round up so many people and throw them in jail. It does not have to come down to this. There are other ways to solve problems in our communities and it is well known that jails only cause more problems to everyone involved: the victim, the accused and society. 
In Jeannette's book, she writes the different reasons that had brought each woman into jail and shows the reader that many of these woman are not criminals, they are simply victims themselves. 

Contributions 

All contributions made to this campaign will go towards the publishing and marketing costs that involve launching a book. If you live in Canada or the United States, you could purchase a book in advance in the perks section for $30 (shipping included) which will be sent as soon as the book is published (by September 30) or feel free to donate any amount you wish. 

Ankle Bone Books - Jeannette's self-publishing company

If this was true, there would be very few prisons and very few prisoners. 
Unfortunately, the reality of jail is that they are full of mostly Canada's poorer people who are stuck in a situation that they cannot afford to get out of. As a matter of fact, anyone at anytime could find themselves incarcerated whether they actually committed a crime or not. 

War
Incarceration is an attack among Canada's poor.  
There is no need to round up so many people and throw them in jail. It does not have to come down to this. There are other ways to solve problems in our communities and it is well known that jails only cause more problems to everyone involved: the victim, the accused and society. 
In Jeannette's book, she writes the different reasons that had brought each woman into jail and shows the reader that many of these woman are not criminals, they are simply victims themselves. 


Contributions All contributions made to this campaign will go towards the publishing and marketing costs that involve launching a book. If you live in Canada or the United States, you could purchase a book in advance in the perks section for $30 (shipping included) which will be sent as soon as the book is published (by September 30) or feel free to donate any amount you wish. 

Ankle Bone Books - Jeannette's self-publishing company

story:
NOV 20 UPDATE: Please visit www.PICCOPUPPY.com to buy the book.

 
“BEAUTIFUL” (Editor's Pick) - Publishers Weekly's BookLife
“CHARMING” - Kirkus Reviews
“WOW!” ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ - Billy Bob Buttons, 2014 UK People's Book Prize Winner


Successfully funded on Kickstarter (187 backers ordered 400 copies)

 

This is a mockup image of what the book will look like.

 

Empowering · Enchanting · Inclusive

 

Empower your children and children you care about to be the best they can be, with this beautifully inspiring and inclusive book of wishes, love, and happiness.

Bursting with empowering wishes of happiness and love, and beautifully enchanting illustrations by a prize-winning artist, I Wish You Happiness is an inspiring expression of love for wishers of all ages.

 

I wish you love and affection, to fill your beautiful heart with an ocean of joy.

 

We wish love for our children, to show them they're loved and treasured.

 

I wish you dreams and aspirations, to spread your wings and reach for the stars.

 

We wish our children to dream big and aspire to do achieve great things, to show them there are no limits to what they can achieve.

In this beautifully whimsical illustration, a young Neil Armstrong dreams of going to the moon, years before he took that giant leap. And a young Katherine Johnson, whose work at NASA and her incredible mind for math, helped Neil and his fellow astronauts fly to the moon. A cute little Shiba Inu looks on.

 

I wish you imagination and creativity, for the world is a blank canvas to paint your masterpiece.

 

We wish our children imagination and creativity, to show them there are no boundaries to where their imagination might take them.

In this cute, whimsical illustration, a young J. K. Rowling is dreaming up magical stories with her incredible imagination, years before she wrote Harry Potter, the best-selling book series in history. Joanne's adorable West Highland Terrier sits alongside her watching the magic unfold.

 

I wish you knowledge and wisdom, for they are the foundations of a successful life.

 

We wish our children knowledge and wisdom, to show them the importance of education and learning.

 

I wish you kindness and generosity, for no act of kindness is ever wasted, no matter how small.

 

With empowering wishes of happiness, love, dreams, courage, hope, and more, I Wish You Happiness inspires children to be the best they can be.

We live in an increasingly diverse world. Every child is unique, whether they're from a different ethnic or cultural background, wear glasses, or have a special need. We all want to raise our children to be tolerant, accepting, and empathetic.

The beautifully enchanting illustrations embrace diversity and inclusion and show children the many ways we are different from one another, to help them understand and accept themselves and others as unique individuals.

Children will learn that they should always be kind to people, even those who are different from them. Because to other people, THEY are different too.

Enrich children you care about with this beautiful and empowering expression of ❤️ and happiness–a truly thoughtful gift for any occasion.

 

Can You Spot the Dogs?

 

Children are going to have fun spotting 17 cute little dogs (and one cat) in the book!

 

Kids (Big & Small) Will ❤️ This Book

 

Our dream is to get I Wish You Happiness into the hands of every child. Buy a copy for every child you know; your daughter, son, niece, nephew, grandchildren, friends' children, and students; to share empowering wishes of happiness, love, and hope.

This beautiful, meaningful, inclusive book is a truly thoughtful gift for any occasion: Christmas, birthdays, baby showers, and graduations. Kids (big and small) will love it!

Support this Kickstarter project to invest in the future of the next generation and help parents raise happier kids.

With everything that's going on in the world right now, there's no better time to help us bring positive energy to the world.

 

I Wish You Happiness Hardcover

 

This is a mockup image of what the book will look like.

 

I Wish You Happiness is a beautiful, LARGE 10x10 inch (25x25 cm), library-quality hardcover with a premium matte look and feel.

The 38 beautifully illustrated pages are printed on quality, 105lb matte paper. The pages are stitched together using binder thread, a process known as Smyth Sewn binding. This is the highest quality book binding available on the market today.

The pages are protected by a beautiful hardcover with a contemporary matte finish. This library-quality book is produced by a top-quality printer, whose clients include Random House, Disney, and Scholastic.

 

Six Cute Picco Puppy Books 

 

 

★★★★★ "Highly recommended" – Jack Magnus, Readers’ Favorite.

★★★★★ "Excellent" - Diane Donovan, Midwest Book Review.

Order the 9, 30, or 50 Hardcovers reward, and you'll receive a digital copy (PDF/EPUB/MOBI) of all 6 Picco Puppy books. They're fun, easy-to-read, rhyming children's books with morals stories and cute, colorful, cartoon illustrations for young kids ages two plus.

 

Free Shipping To USA & AUSTRALIA

 

We ship worldwide, with FREE SHIPPING to the United States (48 contiguous states) and Australia!

Hawaii/Alaska customers: We use USPS Media Mail to minimize the cost of shipping. Unfortunately, Media Mail to Hawaii and Alaska is expensive and very slow (can take over a month). We think the best solution is USPS Priority Mail. There is a cost, but your books will arrive sooner. Please select "Canada" as your shipping destination. We'll fix up your address after the campaign ends. Thanks for your understanding.

We ship WORLDWIDE from Australia. Unfortunately, the cost of shipping by air seems to have increased somewhat recently.

Disclaimer: Please check with your local tax office for any duty/sales tax due on imported books. We cannot be held responsible for any fees they may charge you. 

 

100 Copies For Children In Need 

 

 

This Christmas, we're going to share heartfelt wishes of happiness, love, and hope with 100 vulnerable and disadvantaged children in Barnardos's care, by giving each of them a copy of I Wish You Happiness.

With your help, we'll donate 100 copies of I Wish You Happiness to the 2020 Barnardos Gifts for Kids Christmas Gift Appeal. The appeal aims to deliver at least one Christmas gift to over 10,000 vulnerable and disadvantaged children, who might otherwise not receive a Christmas gift.

Just the thought of a child not having a gift to open at Christmas brings tears to my eyes. :-( We need to share some happiness, love, and hope with these vulnerable children, to show them someone cares, to give them hope for the future.

If you'd like to donate copies of I Wish You Happiness to the 2020 Barnardos Gifts for Kids Christmas Gift Appeal, order the Christmas Gifts For 50 Kids Philanthropy reward. The donation will be in your name and appear on the Barnardos website.

You may order this reward for yourself to give the books to people you care about. :-)

 

Caring For Our Planet

 

 

Giving books to children is great. But we must also take care of our planet, for our children, and our children's children.

We're going do our bit by making a donation to plant 100 trees. It will help to replace the trees taken from the earth to print the books, and offset the carbon footprint caused by shipping the books to customers.

 

Funds & Timeline

 

So far, we've invested:

  • six months of hard work by a team of three creative professionals; and
  • AU$8,000 on the beautiful illustrations and book design.

 

We've successfully raised AU$8,739 from 187 backers (~ US$6,064 / £4,866 / €5,398) to print and ship the first thousand copies of I Wish You Happiness to customers. We're still accepting orders, so please keep 'em coming.

 

Project Timeline

  • December: Michael, the author, started work on the book.
  • January: Ann, the book's illustrator, started drawing the illustrations.
  • April: David, the book designer, started designing the book.
  • June: Kickstarter crowdfunding project + Final illustrations for David to get the book ready for the printer.
  • July: Indiegogo crowdfunding + We quality check the sample proof.
  • August: The book is printed.
  • September-October: The books are shipped by sea to the United States and Australia.
  • Beginning of November: The books are shipped to customers in time for Christmas.

 

Meet The Creators

 

 

I Wish You Happiness is brought to you by three professionals, passionate about children's books, with years of experience in writing, illustration, and design.

Michael Wong is the author of six Picco Puppy children's picture books, available in ebook and paperback on Amazon.com and worldwide. He lives with his wife and two boys in Sydney, Australia.

Ann Baratashvili is the illustrator for A Christmas Carol and The Little Prince, published by major publishers in South Korea and Georgia, respectively. She won first prize at the 2009 DeviantART/Wacon "Bring Your Vision to Life - Dreams Contest," beating out thousands of other talented artists from all over the world.

David Miles is a US-based designer of over 300 books, and an award-winning author and/or illustrator of over 40 titles.

 

Reviews

“The wide-ranging affirmations and lovely artwork make this an excellent baby shower gift or a whimsical graduation present. Both adults and children will find this bedtime read worth returning to again and again.” (Editor's Pick)
- Publishers Weekly's BookLife
“A warm hug of a picture book wishing all children happy, fulfilled, and meaningful lives.”
- Kirkus Reviews
“…deserves a place in any parent's shelf as a read-aloud reinforcer of how to view the world and cultivate a better life and attitude towards it.”
- Diane Donovan, Senior Reviewer, Midwest Book Review
“A wonderfully sweet picture book inspiring children to be all they can be. Highly recommended!” ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
- Billy Bob Buttons, 2014 UK People's Book Prize Winner (Children's Category)

FAQ

 

What's the target age of the book?

The book is suitable for kids (big and small) from 5 to 105.

 

When will I receive the book?

Books should be shipped out at the beginning of November. We've tried to minimize shipping costs. Saving money comes at a price. Hence, shipping in the United States may take 3 to 10 business days, or more. Shipping in Australia may take 3 to 7 business days, or more. We'll ship books to Canada, the UK, Europe, and the rest of the world from Australia. Hence, it may take up to 15 business days, or more, to reach you. Your book should arrive in plenty of time for Christmas. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

 

Thank You!

 

Ann, David, and I would like to thank you in advance for supporting our project. We appreciate every penny pledged. We wish you the best of luck and success with your projects.

story:
Why your support is Important?

Effective analysis is required to support the context of this book to ensure the reader gets a full unbiased perspective on all healing methods, their benefits and potential risks.  

 

Our Path to Healing

 

What's Inside the Book

A short video preview

   

 

There is a way to stop the struggle with trauma, illness, pain and chronic health problems.

 

The statistics show that issues related to our holistic health, meaning our mind, body and soul, are on the rise.  Todays research is demonstrating the potential healing benefits of the mind, body, and spirit connection. Certain ancient healing practices have shown remarkable abilities to reverse many our modern health problems using a holistic approach.  Paired with some modern healing technologies and discoveries on harnessing the power of the energy body, each individual can  begin to heal themselves from several chronic illnesses.

 

The creation of this book requires much research and your contribution will help keep this project on track. 

 

To contribute to this project, you can click on the "Back It" button or select one of the rewards noted. 

 

For more details about each reward, please scroll down to the  "Your Rewards" section.

 

The Benefits

The rewards from the healing modalities in this book are beyond good health.  It’s understanding our connection with ourselves and how it impacts everything around us. 

 

What is healing?

Healing is relieving or curing the physical and psychological symptoms such as pain or emotional traumas by getting to the root cause of the issues which triggered the trauma or disease. 

True healing is digging deep into the mind and body to discover the truth within the individual. True healing comes when we have awakened our consciousness using a combination of the several healing modalities that will be covered in "Our Path to Healing."

 

Sorting out the facts with research

My goal is to present the facts and research the effectiveness of several healing methods which are not part of the mainstream methods of treating our most common and debilitating health issues. 

Classifying each healing modality for:

  • Overall effectiveness
  • Safety and risk
  • Therapeutic use 
  • Depth of healing
  • Anti-aging properties 
  • Ability to reverse diseases or traumas 
  • Cost effectiveness 
  • How it Compared to drug therapies 

 

The Funding Goal

This is a year long project and the goal of this campaign is to raise $80,000 for the following expenses:

  • Travel expenses to meet with leading experts around the world in the fields of studies covering the healing methods within this book.
  • Travel expenses to meet with people who have transformed their lives and healed their traumas, diseases and addictions with the multiple healing methods covered in this book.
  • Research to compile more than adequate material evidence to enlighten the reader with a balanced view from all angles.
  • Your contribution will give me the chance to find and question the people who have healed themselves, and to interview and participate in the research being conducted on several healing methods.  

 

The Research to be covered

These and more topics will be woven together with extensive research and interviews to not only bring clarity but to spread the benefits of this research far and wide.   

  • All healing modalities that work with the energy body to bring back vitality.
  • The experts, their research and their impact on revolutionizing health and well being.
  • Bringing together ancient wisdom with modern science and medicine.
  • How awareness of the self is the first step towards healing.
  • How the mind can heal the body and the work involved to heal.
  • Testimonials and my personal experiences with many healing modalities and its long term impacts.
  • Simplify how each method of healing works on a physical, energetic, spiritual and psychological level by dissecting how they relate to our human existence.
  • The bigger picture on global healing and the impact on society and the planet.

Please Note: to learn more about the many healing methods that will be covered in "Out Path to Healing," I invite you to read or watch the amazing healing stories on my Blog.

 

The Stories of Healing: Blogs and Podcasts

A series of videos and podcasts will compliment the book as I find and interview the courageous men and women who have healed themselves by facing their greatest fears and health challenges.  

I will be periodically showcasing the ongoing research that continues to uncover the abilities of the healing modalities mentioned in the book "Our Path to Healing", to further demonstrate and empower the world to reawaken their abilities of self-healing.

 

Critical Mental Health Statistics

Click here for more statistics on global health at Our Path to Healing.

  • Depression is the leading cause of disability worldwide and a major contributor to the overall global burden of disease. More women are affected by depression than men.
  • Globally, it is estimated that up to 1 billion children aged 2–17 years, have experienced physical, sexual, or emotional violence or neglect in the past year.
  • One in 5 women and 1 in 13 men report having been sexually abused as a child.
  • Consequences of child abuse include impaired lifelong physical and mental health.
  • 1 in 3 (35%) of women worldwide have experienced either physical and/or sexual intimate partner violence or non-partner sexual violence in their lifetime.

 

Support the Mission

 

Your Rewards for Funding My Research

Thank you for being a contributor to Our Path To Healing. You made it this far and I appreciate your support for making this project a success.

Anyone who donates will receive one of the following that corresponds with their contribution amount:

  • E-book copy of book "Our Path to Healing" - $17 value
  • First edition Soft Cover (backers only) book "Our Path to Healing" - $25 value
  • First edition Hard Cover (backers only) book "Our Path to Healing" - $38 value
  • Reiki Healing session - one hour (in person or long distance) - $110 value
  • A stunning photo book “It’s Never Too Far” (visit gallery for details) - $55 value
  • One Photo ready to download and print. (visit gallery of images) - $50 value
  • Two Photos ready to download and print. (visit gallery of images) - $100 value
  • One 8 x 10 print. Select from the Gallery (ships only in Canada & USA) - $10 value
  • 2 hour portrait photo session with editing and one 8 by 10 inch print - $600 value

ALSO - All contributors will be a part of the following collective spirit of this project:

  • A very special thank you with your contribution mentioned on our website.
  • Your name mentioned as a contributor inside the book.
  • Share your experiences of healing and interact with others through my website or facebook

  • Send me a short Video of yourself saying "Together We Can Help Heal the World," so I can add it to a video montage showing all who supported this project.

Note on book delivery: copies of "Our Path to Healing" will be delivered after the publishing of the first edition is confirmed, with an Estimated publishing date of of June 2020.

All other rewards: an email will be sent to select your images and make arrangements for timing of your specific rewards, once the campaign is completed.

 

By supporting this project, you are also supporting the local community.

The spirit of this project is to empower and help community and global programs which help bring back balance to individuals, families and communities in need of assistance.

Therefore, 5% of contributions collected above $40,000 (net of expenses) will be donated to Aangen, a community charity with a mission to provide sustainable solutions to social injustices such as hunger and homelessness.

Aangen was selected out of many because it's an exceptional model for social assistance.

Read more about their programs at www.aangen.com/programs

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for reading about the campaign! No problem if you aren't in a position to financially contribute. Here are other ways you can help that will be greatly appreciated: 

  • Share it now on social media!
  • Tell your family and friends about this fundraising at work, school, and at parties
  • Go to  ourpathtohealing.com to receive updates on our latest healing blogs, podcasts and videos
  • Join the Our Path to Healing Facebook group
  • Subscribe to the Our Path to Healing Youtube Channel 
  • Follow me on Instagram
  • Follow me on Twitter
  • Spend every moment of your day with joy and gratitude
  • Supporting Local Community or Research organizations listed below:

www.aangen.com

www.covenanthousetoronto.ca

www.mapscanada.org

www.sickkids.ca

www.camh.ca

 

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ

 

The Challenges

The main challenge currently is getting as many people as possible to support the research needed to meet my targeted deadline of June 2020.  I'm hoping you can help me by sharing this project with others who can help financially and are interested in sharing their own stories of healing. 

  • To overcome any financial hurdles, I will have a tight budget to keep expenses low.
  • Aside from my own funds, I have set aside a line of credit to cover unforeseen expenses.

For more details about each reward, please scroll down to the  "Your Rewards" section.
 
The Benefits

The rewards from the healing modalities in this book are beyond good health.  It’s understanding our connection with ourselves and how it impacts everything around us. 
 
What is healing?
Healing is relieving or curing the physical and psychological symptoms such as pain or emotional traumas by getting to the root cause of the issues which triggered the trauma or disease. 
True healing is digging deep into the mind and body to discover the truth within the individual. True healing comes when we have awakened our consciousness using a combination of the several healing modalities that will be covered in "Our Path to Healing."
 
Sorting out the facts with research
My goal is to present the facts and research the effectiveness of several healing methods which are not part of the mainstream methods of treating our most common and debilitating health issues. 
Classifying each healing modality for:

Overall effectiveness
Safety and risk
Therapeutic use 
Depth of healing
Anti-aging properties 
Ability to reverse diseases or traumas 
Cost effectiveness 
How it Compared to drug therapies 

 
The Funding Goal
This is a year long project and the goal of this campaign is to raise $80,000 for the following expenses:

Travel expenses to meet with leading experts around the world in the fields of studies covering the healing methods within this book.
Travel expenses to meet with people who have transformed their lives and healed their traumas, diseases and addictions with the multiple healing methods covered in this book.
Research to compile more than adequate material evidence to enlighten the reader with a balanced view from all angles.
Your contribution will give me the chance to find and question the people who have healed themselves, and to interview and participate in the research being conducted on several healing methods.  

 
The Research to be covered
These and more topics will be woven together with extensive research and interviews to not only bring clarity but to spread the benefits of this research far and wide.   

All healing modalities that work with the energy body to bring back vitality.
The experts, their research and their impact on revolutionizing health and well being.
Bringing together ancient wisdom with modern science and medicine.
How awareness of the self is the first step towards healing.
How the mind can heal the body and the work involved to heal.
Testimonials and my personal experiences with many healing modalities and its long term impacts.
Simplify how each method of healing works on a physical, energetic, spiritual and psychological level by dissecting how they relate to our human existence.
The bigger picture on global healing and the impact on society and the planet.

Please Note: to learn more about the many healing methods that will be covered in "Out Path to Healing," I invite you to read or watch the amazing healing stories on my Blog.
 
The Stories of Healing: Blogs and Podcasts
A series of videos and podcasts will compliment the book as I find and interview the courageous men and women who have healed themselves by facing their greatest fears and health challenges.  
I will be periodically showcasing the ongoing research that continues to uncover the abilities of the healing modalities mentioned in the book "Our Path to Healing", to further demonstrate and empower the world to reawaken their abilities of self-healing.



 
Critical Mental Health Statistics
Click here for more statistics on global health at Our Path to Healing.

Depression is the leading cause of disability worldwide and a major contributor to the overall global burden of disease. More women are affected by depression than men.
Globally, it is estimated that up to 1 billion children aged 2–17 years, have experienced physical, sexual, or emotional violence or neglect in the past year.
One in 5 women and 1 in 13 men report having been sexually abused as a child.
Consequences of child abuse include impaired lifelong physical and mental health.
1 in 3 (35%) of women worldwide have experienced either physical and/or sexual intimate partner violence or non-partner sexual violence in their lifetime.

 
Support the Mission

 
Your Rewards for Funding My Research
Thank you for being a contributor to Our Path To Healing. You made it this far and I appreciate your support for making this project a success.
Anyone who donates will receive one of the following that corresponds with their contribution amount:

One 8 x 10 print. Select from the Gallery (ships only in Canada & USA) - $10 value

Aangen was selected out of many because it's an exceptional model for social assistance.
Read more about their programs at www.aangen.com/programs

Thank you for reading about the campaign! No problem if you aren't in a position to financially contribute. Here are other ways you can help that will be greatly appreciated:

The main challenge currently is getting as many people as possible to support the research needed to meet my targeted deadline of June 2020.  I'm hoping you can help me by sharing this project with others who can help financially and are interested in sharing their own stories of healing. 

To overcome any financial hurdles, I will have a tight budget to keep expenses low.

story:
Short Summary

  • During three years of research and two years of editing, conducted mainly in Romania, France, and Poland, I explored the history of European Yiddish theatre. While this theatre tradition is rather young at less than 150 years old, it is extraordinarily rich and diverse, spanning both sides of the Atlantic.My book is about the contemporary Yiddish theatre in Europe on historical background and was supposed to be published in July 2014 but the Polish Government gave me only half of the grant, this is simply not enough.
  • My publisher, Professor Janusz Degler from The University of Wroclaw, wants me to find remaining $3000 and I have until January 24 to raise the money in order to start the publishing process right away. Otherwise the Polish Government won't support the project and I won't be able to publish my book, which I've spent five years working on.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The $3000 I raise will go to the publishing process for my book. If I don't reach my entire goal, the book will NEVER be published


  • If you donate $10, I'll teach you a Yiddish curse word that you'll NEVER FORGET!
  • If you donate $25, I'll give you a one-hour virtual Yiddish class, teaching the basics of Yiddish, not only will you be able to curse in Yiddish but you can also tell jokes in Yiddish and talk to your old grandma.
  • If you donate $100, I'll give you up to 3 hours of Yiddish lessons plus a Yiddish CD of my favorite yiddish classics.
  • If you donate $500, I'll not only give you up to five hours of Yiddish lessons but also inscribe your name in my book, personally thanking you for your support. I'll also send you the book before it's released!
  • If you donate $1000 or more, I will dedicate my book to you, provide you with countless Yiddish lessons, give you copies of all my favorite Yiddish songs plus I'll give you a copy of my book, personally autographed by me.

The Impact

My aim was to see if Yiddish-language theatre is still visible in Europe beyond the deep depths of archives. Furthermore, I wanted to find out if the current state of Yiddish theatre in Europe could be said to be genuine or if, perhaps, it was just virtual. The project is above all aimed at answering the question of whether or not it makes any sense to have an active Yiddish theatre today. I also explore other issues relating to the role of contemporary Yiddish theatre in modern Europe and its potential future. 

During my research, I had an opportunity to get familiar with several generations of Yiddish theatre artists, both through archival research, as well as through interviews with contemporary actors, poets, and directors. The people I interviewed seemed very touched by being able to speak in Yiddish about Yiddish theatre with a young person. My journey was highly emotional and fruitful. The topic may not be very popular, but without doubt it is worth exploring.

In my book, I focused on the works of the theatres which still perform in Yiddish (for example: Jewish State Theatre of Bucharest, Jewish State Theatre of Warsaw, LufTheatre in Strasbourg, and Troïm Theatre in Paris). I analyzed their work carefully and I came to the conclusion, that Yiddish theatre as a form of art might have some chance of future development, although, because of its “virtual” shape, it will be completely different that before March 1986. It will also remain, most likely, a part of off-off culture and never reach the main stream theatre. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you don't have any money but you are funny, then pass this along to all your friends and family! I really need all the help I can get and your grandma would be proud of you if you can help me.

story:
Who are true heroes?

Marvel’s Avengers is one of the world's favorite heroes. In real life, however, we witness true heroes living among us—the firefighters. 

 

In GOGO RESQ,

We learn about different types of firefighters. We know firefighters put out fires and help save lives. They also show up in our day to day crisis, no matter how big or small. In GOGO RESQ, we hope to uncover the stories of firefighters we rarely know.

 

By going on daily adventures with Brook, Coney and Tori, we learn about a variety of ways firefighters combat fires, and specific approaches to deal with fires at home and at schools. We also learn the importance of yielding the right of way to emergency vehicles including fire trucks.

 

How can fire safety education be both informative and engaging? 

This question shaped the creation of this picture book, which is easily accessible and can be read at any time. GOGO RESQ consists of endearing characters and engaging stories, appealing to both children and parents in raising awareness about fire safety.

 

While making this book, we have witnessed the truly heartbreaking scenes of animals and firefighters affected by Australia's devastating bushfires. Part of the revenue will be used as donations for Australian bushfire recovery.

*All images are for illustrative purposes only and may differ from the actual product.

story:
¿Qué?

La larga sombra de la esvástica muestra la facilidad con la que se puede caer en un movimiento, en principio, totalmente ajeno a la naturaleza de cada cual.

Thomas es un adolescente alemán, introvertido y con una mentalidad que le hace sentirse distanciado de la sociedad, que verá cómo su vida gira drásticamente hacia posiciones extremistas a partir de una mudanza y una serie de acontecimientos que le ligarán con Reinhard Heydrich, famoso oficial nazi, también conocido como «la bestia rubia» o «el carnicero de Praga».

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Daniel Morón.

Nacido en Cabañas de Ebro (Zaragoza) en 1996, es ingeniero aeroespacial, especializado en propulsión aeroespacial, por la Universidad Politécnica de Madrid.

Apasionado de la literatura desde la infancia e influenciado por autores tan dispares como Herman Hesse, José Saramago o Chuck Palahniuk. El interés por la escritura comienza pronto, en 2010, con catorce años escribe su primera novela, finalista del I Premio Nacional de Novela Alcorcón Siglo XXI y finalista del Premio de Novela Jordi Sierra i Fabra de 2012. De nuevo, finalista del Premio de Novela Jordi Sierra i Fabra en las ediciones de 2013 y 2014, con dos nuevas novelas. También, cuenta con la publicación de un relato corto, «Los últimos pasos», como consecución del segundo premio en el IX certamen literario Ana Mª Aparicio Pardo de relato corto para jóvenes de 2011.

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«Aparté la vista del espejo y salí del baño para tumbarme sobre la cama. Faltaba todavía mucho para la hora de la cena y mis padres aún estaban recogiendo tras la mudanza, todas mis pertenencias debían encontrarse en el interior de alguna caja. En ese momento, recordé cierta caja de cartón que descansaba a los pies de mi cama. Avancé hacia ella y retiré las polvorientas y humedecidas solapas, permitiendo así desvelar su contenido.
          Lo que encontré en su interior me llamó bastante la atención, libros, tal y como había dicho mi padre, no obstante, no libros cualesquiera. A pesar de su estado deteriorado, cubiertos de una gran capa de polvo y del color amarillento que mostraban sus hojas, lo que se escondía tras la portada eran, sin duda, algunas de las mayores obras maestras de la literatura.
          Mi sorpresa no hizo salvo acrecentarse cuando al coger el primer libro descubrí que se trataba de Fausto de Goethe y que el que se encontraba junto a él era Las tribulaciones de joven Werther, también del mismo autor. Seguí maravillándome con las continuas obras alemanas que desenterraba de aquella caja, que había sido su prisión durante décadas.
          Aunque todos los libros habían llamado mi atención, en mayor o menor medida, al llegar a los dos últimos la chispa de la curiosidad se prendió en mí. Se trataban de dos ejemplares no más antiguos, aunque en peor estado. El primero de ellos poseía unas medidas normales, con una portada de color anaranjado en el que podía leerse el título de la obra, Mein Kampf. Me pregunté qué clase de nombre era Mi lucha como nombre para una novela, pues jamás había oído algo similar, resultaba atrayente, inquietante y hacía acudir a mi mente numerosas elucubraciones sobre su contenido.
          Maquinaciones que no tuve tiempo de comprobar pues mis ojos se volvieron rápidamente hacía el último ejemplar que yacía en el fondo de la caja, más pequeño que el resto, sin portada ni nombre del autor, ni tan siquiera título, simplemente una tapa envejecida, con las esquinas deterioradas y dobladas. Lo abrí por su primera hoja, tan solo una simple frase escrita a mano.
          He aquí la vida de un patriota alemán».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Daniel Morón vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad

story:
My name is John Masters and my Artistic Pseudonym Name is Juan Leon Guerrero Magas (Guamanian translate: John Leon Guerrero Boss).

I first started into the Arts around 1964 when my younger Brother and I would perform plays for our Mother in an old gazebo at the woods edge in Greenland, New Hampshire. The adjacent Piscataqua River had the perfect clay for the heads of puppets that we made in the North Congregational Church in nearby Portsmouth.

I performed in PTA plays at the Greenland Central School and was additionally influenced by my Mother and various literary arts teachers.

In addition to acting, I cherish nature, photography, drawing and writing.

I was a trades industry local union newsletter editor in Los Angeles and started writing longer poems while in the United States Air Force.

As I have now retired from the military, my funds aren't adequate to pay for this book to be printed and bound.

I am relying almost exclusively on charitable donations from anyone who can empathize with my predicament and passionate dream of getting published.

Poetry is a hard sell; only a small percentage of people take time in their day to “smell the roses” and read a poem. My goal is to feed the passion of those individuals and to inspire them to become contagious in their joy, so as to affect others with whom they come in contact with each day. It is my wish that all will slow down enough to enjoy more of what life has to offer.

Publishing this book, “THE ADVENTURES OF CAPTAIN CALYPSO AND HIS MENAGERIE OF KALEIDOSCOPE DREAMS *(A PROSETIC ECLECTION) by Juan Leon Guerrero Magas, is a goal that I have and I certainly hope that it lends itself to contributing toward a better world. Therein lies much of my artistic life’s work and some of my best creative results. The book includes poems and pictures that, when combined in such a way, reads like a journey in one’s mind, much like that of life itself.

Poetry doesn’t have to have the last word in every other line rhyme in its original language, but instead, its message should rhyme in every translation. Here is a short poem that I penned in my kitchen as I tried to capture an audience’s attention; if only for a quick pause and ponder:

“Life in the Woods”

by JLGM (08 June 2014)

Standing among the redwoods, rays of sunshine coming out of the ground like swords, glimmering, the doe looks at her fawn and hopes her buck is soon to appear. He had gone down to the pool over the ridge to stand at the water’s edge and take in its refreshing liquid, both internally and visually, as the morning mist danced along its surface. It was beginning to be another wonderful day. The forest was a good place to live and play. Here, all creatures lived in harmony.

A rabbit was nibbling on a fern head, while two chipmunks were playing a combination of “Hide and Seek” and “Tag”. The fawn was taking interest; what were these fellows doing, he thought to himself. A turtle came into view. It seems he too was headed to the pond. Yesterday, he had rested on a rock near a few frogs that were sitting on lily pads. Well, he’d be there by midday.

That evening, as the orange sky was fading and the planets started to glow in the heavens, the raccoons and polecats were awakening and joining the owls and bats in working the night shift. Fireflies, those lightning bugs, were intermingling with the stars above and all was well in the enchanted forest. It was beginning to be another wonderful night.

I hope that you share my love of prose, poem and art enough to contribute toward our success in stimulating the minds of people and encouraging them to “stop and enjoy the view”. And, please do share your dreams, hopes, aspirations and experiences with others.

Thank you,

Juan LG Magas

My goal is to get nearly $8,000 to the publisher beoretheend ofOctober, 2014.

The adjacent Piscataqua River had the perfect clay for the heads of puppets that we made in the North Congregational Church in nearby Portsmouth.I performed in PTA plays at the Greenland Central School and was additionally influenced by my Mother and various literary arts teachers.In addition to acting, I cherish nature, photography, drawing and writing.I was a trades industry local union newsletter editor in Los Angeles and started writing longer poems while in the United States Air Force.As I have now retired from the military, my funds aren't adequate to pay for this book to be printed and bound.I am relying almost exclusively on charitable donations from anyone who can empathize with my predicament and passionate dream of getting published.

story:
Story of My Book

Banish the Darkness is a young adult fantasy novel that centers on three humans that must save two worlds, including their own, from the control of a cruel King. Along the way, they learn of their own strengths and weaknesses, and must come to terms with the fact that nothing will be the same again.

My name is Ollie Monteleone and I am the author of Banish the Darkness. I wrote this book because I’ve always wanted to be an author, and since I dreamt up this idea in 2017, I knew I wanted to share it with the world.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will be able to step outside reality and explore the worlds I’ve created, and the characters that inhabit them. I want you to see this book as a chance to witness the choices each character makes, and observe how it impacts the plot as well as their own arcs, unable to escape from the consequences of their actions. 

You will love this book if you enjoy young adult fantasy novels with well-developed characters, if you enjoy complicated plot lines, and if you enjoy deep, and often morally grey villains. 

Banish the Darkness speaks to fantasy lovers and allies and members of the LGTBQ+ community who want to grapple with family and evil in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Banish the Darkness inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

How can I help others while remaining true to myself?

How important are blood family and chosen family in people’s lives?

How can we better ourselves by normalizing those different from us? 

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing chosen family vs blood family, being true to yourself, embracing your differences, and always fighting for the betterment of ourselves and others will change us all for the better. 
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

 

About the Author


Ollie Monteleone is currently a student at Marist College and will be graduating May 2021 with a degree in English with a concentration in Writing. They are also pursuing minors in Philosophy, Professional Writing, English Literature, and Creative Writing. They have been on the dean’s list for seven semesters and expect to graduate with Latin honors. They are also the captain and president of the Marist College Fencing Team. 

Ollie wrote this book after having a fantastical dream and knowing that the idea would be far too interesting to not share with other book lovers. They want to highlight how important representation is in creative literature, especially young adult literature, and hope that this book is able to resonate with a broad audience. 

Ollie likes to read and write, and has a ton of half-finished ideas right behind Banish the Darkness. When they aren’t writing, they’re getting active and swimming, whenever possible. Ollie also loves all types of music, except country, and jams out all day in order to gain inspiration. 

For more information, you can connect with Ollie at olmonteleone@gmail.com and at @olliemonteleone and @authorolliemonteleone.
 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #BanishtheDarkness and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

You can also follow me on social media: @authorolliemonteleone on Instagram, Olivia Monteleone (https://www.facebook.com/olivia.monteleone.1) on Facebook, and https://www.linkedin.com/in/olivia-monteleone-0... LinkedIn!

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again and all the best,
Ollie

story:
A little about me, and my writing

My (pen) name is Christie Goldenwufe, but most people know me as the artist Christy "Goldenwolf" Grandjean (or just Goldenwolf).  Though I am well known for my artwork of animal people and werewolves, I have always longed to be a writer.  Well before I was doing art as a kid I was writing, immersing myself in my worlds and characters I created, writing for fun.  Writing for myself.  As I grew older I never pursued the writing path, choosing art instead.  Yet the dream of being a published author has remained with me, unfulfilled.  I yearned to be both artist and writer.  I wrote off and on through the years, but when I did write I could never seem to develop a real story, only snippets and scenes, and I felt that telling a story in words might be beyond me.  

It seems I was just waiting for the right story.

I have always been an avid reader, enjoying the sci-fi, fantasy, and horror genres quite a bit, but I always loved romances the best.  Romances were what I always wrote about as an awkward young woman, my head full of dreams and fantasies of true love.  I've also had a love for werewolves since I was young, developing into a full-blown obsession over the years.  It is a love that has never faded, and perhaps has only become stronger with time. 

I started writing "Hunger" in 2006, completely out of the blue (I hadn't written much of anything since my 20s).  My main character Kain just popped right into my head and I knew I would be writing a romance story about him.  Then came Autumn, his love interest, though she wasn't as strong as Kain was at first.  I struggled with their story, writing about eight poorly written chapters with no real plot.  I would become discouraged with it and file the story away, only to come back to it another year and refine it some, then shelve it again.  I never had even half a story or a real plot for years, until January 2014 when the story suddenly came to me, fully formed, with all of its characters and plot, all of its subplots and antagonists.  It was literally "downloaded" into me.  I have no other way to describe it.

So I wrote with a fervor all through 2014, burning with this book in my brain - which I soon came to realize was actually a trilogy - unable to write fast enough in my limited free time to get the story out onto paper (or the computer screen, as it were).   This book, this trilogy, this story has completely consumed my life.  I adore my characters and their story, and they are alive in my head.  I have so much to tell!  "Hunger" is only the beginning of it, and I am currently well into writing the sequel (which is more like the continuation), "Heat".

I have finally completed the long process of publishing, and now my book is a reality thanks to everyone who helped make it possible!

About The Book

Hunger is a dark, paranormal romance bordering on the erotic (this is a mature, adult romance novel on the spicy side.  Meaning there is graphic sex scenes and profanities used.  Ohhh myyy!  18+ please!).  It is based on my werewolf race I have been developing for decades, the Kierrn, and is full of wildness, passion, eroticism, and darkness.  Yet there is also humor, moments of tenderness, joy, and genuine love and caring between the two main characters.  I hope that this will not be just another run-of-the-mill romance novel in a genre that is now over-saturated with werewolves, vampires, and other paranormal creatures.  Hopefully Hunger will stand out above the crowd.  

Please read the plot summary below, and if you are curious, I have made the first two chapters available to read for free to help you decide it you like my style, and my story.  If you are intrigued by the characters and want to read more, please consider contributing to this campaign!  I am offering all formats of the book and some fun perks for your contribution.  While the book is currently available via Amazon.com and other online sources, these perks are only available through this campaign.

Plot Summary

Supernatural abilities, arcane magic, killer good looks, animalistic allure… what’s not to love about being a werewolf?  Kain Ulmer wouldn’t change what he is for the world. He lives a carefree transient life where the only thing that matters is the next woman, the next conquest, the next thrill.  The Hunger is the price he pays, the curse that demands he make a human kill every three moons or risk madness.  Yet he considers the cost worth the rewards of ultimate power and freedom.  Kain has everything he could want—until fate brings him to her...

Autumn Sullivan has the perfect life. She lives in the most beautiful place in the world, a cottage nestled in the sanctuary of an ancient redwood forest.  She has realized her dream of owning a beautiful little coffee shop in the quiet Northern California town where she grew up, and her life is free from the complications of men and relationships. Just her and her friends, her shop, her redwoods, and her safe, simple life—until a dark, dangerous stranger disrupts her world and send her passions flaming.

Kain is determined to win this guarded creature, but he cannot know the wild desires they will awaken in one another, nor the danger he will bring to her doorstep. An evil even Kain cannot fathom targets Autumn, and they both must race to find answers, and a safe haven, before the Hunger catches up to them both.

Read the first two chapters for free on my website!

Formats

Hunger is currently available as an eBook for all readers and devices.

It is also available as a 5" X 8" Trade paperback that is 327 pages.

Hunger will be available as a 6" X 9" hardcover with cloth binding and a dust jacket.  It is 340 pages.  What is special about the hardcover edition is that it features exclusive drawings I have done throughout the book, and in a "sketchbook" in the back. It also features maps and other design elements. 

The full spread of the dust jacket:

The title page from the hardcover interior.

The first hardcover proof in my hot little hands!

Hunger has been extensively edited by a professional editor, and the print books have been designed to all current industry standards with a professional look and feel.

Reviews

Hunger is already getting rave reviews on Amazon and Goodreads.

"LOVED this book! The author is amazing and I love her take on werewolves! I am familiar with her creativity in artwork, but with this book I could get the story behind an amazing piece! I could not put this down, stayed up all night to read it, and cannot wait to get my hardcover in hand to read and read again!" - Amazon Customer

"This is truly a werewolf series I can get into! I adore the author's creative world surrounding these vivid characters. If you are a true paranormal fan, you have to get this book!! Now hungry for the hardback version!" - Kathryn H. on Amazon

"I loved it! I finished it way more quickly than expected, partially because I couldn't put it down! The characters are well put together and believable. I need to like, highlight that and underline it. Believable people....The story line was compelling and I was surprised to see more good story underlining the romance. It's not just about the bow chica! Though those bits are well written as well." - NanhyBug on Amazon

"Went over my expectations, and has almost everything I'd want in a werewolf novel, and there are some pretty hot scenes *wink wink* as well as a great underlying story line and interesting world. I'm eagerly awaiting book #2" - Lunafox on Amazon

"If you love werewolves, sexy times and just a damn good story with all the right amounts of excitement, magic and mystery then pick up this book and get to it." - Sarzcoo on Goodreads

"I always consider a book that i cant put down (and one that i blow off chores for) to be a good one and in my opinion this one was amazing." - Daniel Bayliss on Goodreads

Perks

When you purchase your copy through this campaign, you will receive some exclusive perks available nowhere else!

All print books will be signed, and come with this two-sided bookmark of the main (male) character, Kain in his human and werewolf forms.

The hardcover will be signed and come with the Kain bookmark, and the Dragonfly Coffee & Espresso vinyl sticker.
 

  • $55 - Paperpack Plus.  You will relieve the signed paperback, the Kain bookmark, the dragonfly sticker, and and a t-shirt of your choice from my art website at www.goldenwolfen.com (Calling the Storm tee pictured)  This includes the cost of shipping (and shipping supplies) within the US.  International contributors please add an additional $10 for shipping.

 

  • $70 - Hardcover Plus.  You will receive the signed, illustrated hardcover, the Kain bookmark, the dragonfly sticker, and a t-shirt of your choice from my art website at www.goldenwolfen.com (Calling the Storm tee pictured).  This includes the cost of shipping (and shipping supplies) within the US.  International contributors please add an additional $20 for shipping.
  • $80 - Shift Happens.  You will receive the signed, illustrated hardcover, the Kain bookmark, the dragonfly sticker, a t-shirt of your choice from my website, a "Shift Happens" sticker, and a little extra surprise! This includes the cost of shipping (and shipping supplies) within the US.  International contributors please add an additional $10 for shipping.

  • $100 - Snarley Goodness.  You will receive the signed, illustrated hardcover, the Kain bookmark, the dragonfly sticker, a "Shift Happens" sticker, and I will draw a werewolf for you on the inside cover of the book.  This drawing will be exclusively yours and no two drawings will be alike! This includes the cost of shipping (and shipping supplies) within the US.  International contributors please add an additional $15 for shipping.

Shipping

Although I have set a tentative date for shipping to be in June 2015 I really cannot guarantee that.  Since the novel has yet to be edited, and thus finished, I cannot guarantee and absolute definitive release date.  It may take more editing and rewrites than I think to polish, and finish, this book.  I will keep everyone updated on the progress of the editing, and further updates on when I will have the book in my hot little hands.

All perks include shipping within the US via USPS Priority Mail.  International orders will ship via USPS First Class mail.  International please add the extra amount required to cover the additional cost of shipping outside the US.

Stretch Goals

If we should raise more than the initial $4,000, stretch goals will be announced.  Please keep watching this campaign, or follow the books Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/sate.your.hunger or you can check out my website at http://www.christygrandjean.com

Other ways you can help

If you would like to contribute just to help out (you don't necessarily want anything in return) you can do so at the top of the page where the bright pink button says "Contribute Now".  All you'll get is my heartfelt thanks!

 

I understand that some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!  You can spread the word about this campaign to anyone you think might be interested in my book!

 

Thanks for checking out my funding campaign!
